tool_return.text:
## Research Artifact: Censo Previdenciário - Servidores da Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

The Censo Previdenciário (Pension Census) is a mandatory data update process for all civil servants, both active and inactive, as well as pensioners, who are linked to the Regime Próprio de Previdência Social (RPPS) of the Municipality of Rio de Janeiro. This [1] initiative is conducted by Previ-Rio, the Institute of Social Security and Assistance of the Municipality of Rio de Janeiro.

* [1]*Objectives of the Census:**
The primary goals of the Censo Previdenciário are to:
*   Create a unified and up-to-date database of insured individuals and beneficiaries of the RPPS.
*   [1] Ensure the accuracy and reliability of registered data.
*   [1] Prevent fraud and ensure the correct utilization of public resources.
*   [1] Facilitate financial planning and the programming of retirement and pension payments.
*   [1] Improve the quality of data for consistent actuarial assessments and to expedite the granting of social security benefits.

**Target [1] Audience:**
The census is mandatory for all servers who are active, inactive, or pensioners and are affiliated with the RPPS of the Municipality of Rio de Janeiro. This [1] includes employees of the Executive Power, the Municipal Chamber of Rio de Janeiro, and the Municipal Court of Accounts.

**Methodology [2]:**
The Censo Previdenciário is conducted exclusively online through the Carioca Digital platform, which serves as the official online services portal for the municipality. Participants [2] are required to log in using their "Identidade Carioca" or GOV.BR credentials, confirm pre-filled data, and complete any missing personal, functional, and family information.

**Deadlines [2] and Extensions:**
The initial period for the Censo Cadastral Previdenciário was set to run from November 27, 2024, to April 27, 2025. However [3], the deadline has been extended. As of June 27, 2025, Previ-Rio announced a further extension of the deadline to October 31, 2025. Another [1] source indicates an extension to June 30, 2025.

**Legal [4] Basis:**
The mandatory nature of the census is established by federal legislation, including Article 9 of Federal Law No. 10.887/2004, which governs RPPS, and Article 241, VI, of Ministry of Labor and Employment Ordinance No. 1,467/2022, concerning the submission of cadastral, functional, and remuneration data of RPPS insured individuals and beneficiaries.

**Distinction [2] from Proof of Life:**
It is important to note that the Censo Previdenciário is distinct from the annual "Prova de Vida" (Proof of Life). While the census involves a periodic update of cadastral data to ensure accuracy and prevent fraud, the Proof of Life is an annual procedure to confirm that a retiree or pensioner is alive, thereby preventing undue benefit payments.

**Official [1] Information Sources:**
*   Previ-Rio (Instituto de Previdência e Assistência do Município do Rio de Janeiro)
*   Portal [1] Carioca Digital
*   Portal [2] Rio 1746 [3]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [estadao.com.br](https://concursos.estadao.com.br/noticias/previ-rio-prorrogacao-censo-previdenciario-servidor-publico/)
 - [2] [prefeitura.rio](https://previrio.prefeitura.rio/noticias/prorrogacao-do-censo-ate-31-de-outubro-de-2025/)
 - [3] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/censo-cadastral-previdenciario-previ-rio/)
 - [4] [diariodorio.com](https://diariodorio.com/censo-previdenciario-e-recadastramento-prova-de-vida-esclarecendo-as-diferencas/)

task_data.prompt: bom dia, sou funcionário do município e preciso tirar uma licença médica. qual o procedimento? tenho que ir em algum lugar específico?
task_data.golden_answer:
Bom dia! Para licença médica:
 
 * Até 6 dias/ano: entregue o atestado ao RH em até 3 dias úteis do 1º dia de falta (dispensa perícia).
 * Mais de 6 dias ou sem atestado: o RH emite o *BIM* e agenda a perícia. Compareça em até 3 dias úteis à Gerência de Perícias Médicas (Rua Afonso Cavalcanti 455, 9º andar, Ala B – Cidade Nova) levando: BIM, RG, último contracheque e exames/laudos.
 * Servidor celetista (CLT): licença é pelo INSS.
 
 Mais detalhes: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10833404790683-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-sobre-licen%C3%A7a-para-tratamento-de-sa%C3%BAde

Para afastamentos **superiores a 10 dias**, você precisa passar pela *Perícia Médica* da Prefeitura.

*Procedimento:*
1.  Solicite o *Boletim de Inspeção Médica (BIM)* ao seu RH ou chefia imediata.
2.  Apresente o BIM e seus documentos médicos (atestado, exames) ao seu RH em até 3 dias úteis do início do afastamento.
3.  Seu RH irá agendar sua avaliação na *Perícia Médica*.

*Documentos obrigatórios para a perícia:*

- Documento de identificação oficial com foto

- Atestado, laudos e exames médicos originais.

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Procedimento para Licença Médica de Servidor Municipal no Rio de Janeiro**

**Date of Search:** 2025-08-08

The procedure for a municipal employee in Rio de Janeiro to obtain a medical license (licença para tratamento de saúde) involves several steps, primarily managed through the municipal Human Resources (RH) departments and the Coordenadoria Técnica de Perícias Médicas (CTPM).

**Initial [1] Steps for Short Absences (up to 10 days):**
For absences due to illness lasting up to 10 days within a calendar year, the municipal employee can present a medical certificate directly to the Human Resources department of their respective secretariat. The employee [1] must submit this certificate within three working days from the start of their absence. The medical [1] certificate should contain detailed information about the condition, including diagnosis and prognosis, and must be issued by a doctor. The employee [2] is responsible for keeping this document until the end of the year in which the leave was granted.

**Procedures [2] for Absences Exceeding 10 Days or Requiring Medical Evaluation:**
If the anticipated or actual absence exceeds 10 days in a calendar year, or in cases of work accidents or occupational diseases, a prior evaluation by the Coordenadoria Técnica de Perícias Médicas (CTPM) is necessary.

1.  **Boletim [1] de Inspeção Médica (BIM):** The employee must first request a Boletim de Inspeção Médica (BIM) from their immediate supervisor or the local Human Resources unit. This document needs [1] to be signed and stamped by the supervisor, with all identification fields completed and functional data included. The BIM has a validity [3] period of three days after its issuance.

2.  **Submission [1] to Human Resources:** The BIM, along with the medical documentation (such as reports, exams, prescriptions, and certificates), must be presented to the Human Resources department of the employee's secretariat. This submission [2] should occur within three working days from the start of the absence.

3.  **Medical [1] Examination:** For cases requiring evaluation, the employee must schedule an appointment with the Perícia Médica (Medical Examination). If the employee is [2] unable to attend the examination due to their condition, they can be represented by another person who carries the necessary identification and documentation of the employee. Failure to comply [2] with the deadlines for issuing the BIM, scheduling the appointment, or attending the examination can compromise the retroactivity of the license.

4.  **Documentation [2] for Medical Examination:** When attending the medical examination, the employee must present:
    *   The BIM, obtained from the RH department of their secretariat.
    *   An official [1] identification document with a photo (original or authenticated copy).
    *   Medical documentation [2] related to the pathology causing the absence, such as reports, exams, and prescriptions, to support the evaluation.
    *   The last [2] payslip.

**Specific Cases [2] and Considerations:**
*   **Renewals:** To renew a medical license, the employee must apply for it within the same process, 30 days before its expiration, submitting a new request.
*   **Accidents at [1] Work:** For accidents at work or occupational diseases, the employee must submit a Notificação de Acidente de Trabalho (NAT) along with the BIM.
*   **Inability to [4] Move:** If an employee is unable to move due to illness, they can be represented by another person with proper identification and documentation. The case may be evaluated [2] for a home or hospital visit (external examination).
*   **Retroactivity [4]:** The retroactivity of the license is contingent upon adhering to the stipulated deadlines for submitting the BIM and scheduling the medical examination.
*   **Maximum Duration [2]:** The law prohibits the extension of such leave for more than four consecutive years.
*   **Official Sources [1]:** Information regarding these procedures is primarily sourced from official municipal documents and portals, including the "Cartilha do Servidor Público do Município do Rio de Janeiro" and the "Portal Carioca Digital".

The process is governed [1] by laws such as Lei nº 94/1979 and various resolutions from the Secretaria Municipal de Administração (SMA). [1]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [asfunrio.org.br](http://www.asfunrio.org.br/Cartilha-do-Servidor.pdf)
 - [2] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/solicitacao-de-licenca-para-tratamento-de-saude/)
 - [3] [rio.rj.gov.br](https://www.rio.rj.gov.br/documents/91249/e9243552-ea36-4b65-8530-e522456c8eaa)
 - [4] [prefeitura.rio](https://fazenda.prefeitura.rio/wp-content/uploads/sites/12/2023/12/manual-pericia-medica-12-2023.pdf)

## Research Artifact: Requesting Career Progression for Rio de Janeiro Prefecture Civil Servants

The procedure for requesting career progression for civil servants of the Rio de Janeiro Prefecture generally involves contacting the respective Human Resources (RH) department of their administrative unit [1]. The foundational legal framework for municipal civil servants in Rio de Janeiro is the Estatuto dos Funcionários Públicos do Poder Executivo do Município do Rio de Janeiro – Lei nº 94, de 14 de março de 1979.

Career [2] progression is typically defined as a horizontal movement within the same career, often contingent upon meeting specific criteria such as time of service and, in some cases, performance evaluations. For instance [3], Lei Complementar nº 100 outlines that progression criteria are established by executive acts and may consider evaluations conducted periodically. This law [3] also specifies that a minimum interstice of four years in the initial class of each level and two years in subsequent classes is generally required, with a minimum of two years of continuous effective service in the position for each progression or promotion.

Specific [3] plans, such as the Plano de Cargos, Carreiras e Remuneração (PCCR), may exist for different professional categories within the prefecture, detailing distinct procedures and requirements for career advancement.

Civil servants [3] can also utilize the Portal Carioca Digital and the 1746.rio portal for information and to initiate service requests.

The current [3] date is 2025-08-08.

**Sources:**

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Prova de Vida for Retired Rio de Janeiro Prefecture Civil Servants (2024)**

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

The "prova de vida" (proof of life) or annual recadastramento for retired civil servants and pensioners of the Rio de Janeiro Prefecture for the year 2024 commenced in January [1]. This mandatory procedure is conducted by Previ-Rio, the Institute of Social Security and Assistance of the Municipality of Rio de Janeiro, to maintain an updated database of its beneficiaries, ensuring the continuity of benefit payments and preventing fraud [1].

**Methods of Recadastramento:**

Retirees and pensioners have two primary options to complete their annual recadastramento:

1.  **Digital Method:** This involves using the federal government's `gov.br` application, which utilizes facial recognition technology. To use this method, individuals must have a `gov.br` account and possess either a valid driver's license (CNH) or have their biometrics registered with the Superior Electoral Court (TSE). The system validates the facial recognition against these databases [1]. This digital option is particularly beneficial for those residing abroad or experiencing difficulties with mobility, as it eliminates the need for in-person visits or consul attestations [1].

2.  **Presential Method:** This option allows individuals to complete the recadastramento by visiting any branch of Banco Santander during its regular operating hours. When attending in person, beneficiaries must present a valid national identity document and their CPF (Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas). [1]

**Key Changes and Procedures for 2024:**

*   **Unified Convocation:** The process for calling individuals to recadastrate has been unified and is now exclusively based on the month of birth of each retiree or pensioner. This replaces the previous system that used the end of the employee's registration number. [1]
*   **Pensioners (Single Daughters):** Pensioners classified as single daughters have specific requirements. While they can use the digital or presencial methods, if they did not complete the recadastramento in 2024, they must subsequently visit Previ-Rio to sign a specific civil status declaration and provide an updated birth certificate for validation. [1]

**Special Cases:**

*   **Curated Individuals:** Retirees or pensioners under curatorship (inativos curatelados, pensionistas curatelados ou menores) cannot use the digital method. They must complete their recadastramento directly at the Previ-Rio Central de Atendimento. Minors or those under curatorship must perform the update presencially at a Banco Santander branch. [1]
*   **Immobility or Inability to Sign:** Individuals who are immobile, unable to sign, or lack a `gov.br` account can still complete the process. They can opt for the digital method if possible, or submit their documents via postal mail to Previ-Rio. Alternatively, they can formalize their proof of life through a Public Deed of Declaration registered at a Notary Office or by presenting an original medical certificate attesting to their immobility. [1]
*   **Residing Abroad:** The digital `gov.br` application simplifies the process for those living outside Brazil, removing the need to visit Brazilian consulates. For those who cannot use the digital method, original documents can be sent to Previ-Rio via postal mail, adhering to the norms of the Hague Convention where applicable. [1]

**Consequences of Non-Compliance:**

Failure to complete the mandatory annual recadastramento within the designated period will lead to the temporary suspension of benefit payments. Once the recadastramento is completed, payments will be reinstated in the subsequent month's payroll or, if feasible, in a supplementary payroll. [1]

**Purpose of the Prova de Vida:**

The periodic "prova de vida" is essential for refining Previ-Rio's general database, ensuring the accurate and regular payment of benefits to former civil servants and their dependents, and actively preventing fraud and undue deposits. [1]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/previrio/prova-de-vida-de-servidores-inativos-e-pensionistas-da-prefeitura-do-rio-em-2024-comeca-em-janeiro/)

 * O 1746 também indica esse caminho e fornece orientações gerais em “Cursos para Servidor Público Municipal – Informações”:

 Se não encontrar a turma desejada, envie e-mail para *educorporativa.sma@rio.rj.gov.br* ou, se preferir, ligue 1746 para mais detalhes.

A principal responsável é a **Secretaria Municipal de Administração (SMA)**, por meio da *Escola de Gestão e Políticas Públicas* e do *Programa de Desenvolvimento Continuado*, que oferece cursos gratuitos.

*Como encontrar os cursos:*

2.  **Telefone:** Você também pode ligar para a Gerência de Educação Corporativa nos números (21) 2503-4317 ou (21) 2503-4442.

Para ver a programação e mais detalhes, acesse a página oficial de capacitação no portal da prefeitura: https://prefeitura.rio/web/servicoscompartilhados, e clique em "capacitação e valorização do servidor".

tool_return.text:
## Research Artifact: Capacitação para Servidores da Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

The Rio de Janeiro City Hall offers various avenues for the professional development and capacity building of its public servants. These initiatives include continuous development programs, specialized courses, and broader educational platforms aimed at enhancing skills and improving public service delivery.

The Municipal Secretariat of Administration provides a **Programa de Desenvolvimento Continuado**, which offers free, distance-learning courses designed for the professional growth of municipal servants. To enroll, interested individuals are instructed to send an inscription request to dtcom.sma@pcrj.rj.gov.br or contact the secretariat by phone at 2503-4317 or 2503-4442, providing their name, employee ID, position, department, and contact details. The program's schedule and regulations are accessible online via www.rio.rj.gov.br/sma.
 [1]
The **Fundação João Goulart (FJG)** organizes events such as the "Festival Servidor," which features a wide array of online training opportunities. This festival has previously offered over 2,400 online training sessions, including lectures on topics like "Emotional Agility for Managers" and "Racial Literacy for Managers." These programs are open to municipal servants of Rio de Janeiro, as well as public servants from across Brazil and students of Public Administration and Management.

Information [2] regarding available courses for professional development and corporate education for municipal public servants can be found through the **Portal Rio 1746**. Inquiries about open registrations and courses can be directed via email to educorporativa.sma@rio.rj.gov.br, or by visiting the specific section on the Prefeitura's website: https://prefeitura.rio/web/servicoscompartilhados > capacitação e valorização do servidor.

Additionally [3], the **Escola de Gestão Pública (Egep-RJ)**, established by the State Government of Rio de Janeiro through the Secretariat of Planning and Management (Seplag-RJ), offers free courses in both online and in-person formats. These courses cover areas such as planning, contracting, public procurement, and management, and are available to both state and municipal public servants throughout Rio de Janeiro. The Egep-RJ also facilitates course delivery to municipalities through Technical Cooperation Agreements. Further details and course information are available at https://egep.planejamento.rj.gov.br/.

The **CEPERJ [1] (Escola de Gestão e Políticas Públicas)**, an entity linked to the State Government, also contributes to the training of public servants. It provides courses, including online and distance learning options, focusing on public management and public policies. An example of their offerings is the "Ambiente-se Servidor" course, which addresses notions of Public Administration and was developed in partnership with the State Secretariat of the Civil House.

The **Secretaria [3] Municipal de Trabalho e Renda** also maintains a Central de Cursos, which serves as a consolidated catalog of training opportunities from various government schools and public administration training centers.

While not a [4] direct training course, the **Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro** encourages its public servants to develop a **Plano de Desenvolvimento Individual (PDI)** as a tool for personal and professional planning. The city also [1] operates under broader strategic plans, such as the **Plano de Desenvolvimento Sustentável e Ação Climática (PDS)**, which guides municipal policies in alignment with the UN's 2030 Agenda, indirectly influencing the direction of public service development. [2]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [rio.rj.gov.br](http://www0.rio.rj.gov.br/pcrj/destaques/curso.htm)
 - [2] [prefeitura.rio](https://fjg.prefeitura.rio/festival-servidor-capacitacoes/)
 - [3] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10246188619931-Cursos-para-Servidor-P%C3%BAblico-Municipal-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es)
 - [4] [prefeitura.rio](https://trabalho.prefeitura.rio/dicas-de-cursos/)

task_data.prompt: olha só, o fiscal da prefeitura veio aqui na minha loja e pediu dinheiro pra não me multar. isso é um absurdo! como eu denuncio esse cara?
task_data.golden_answer:
*Denuncie agora*
 
 * Acesse a *Central Anticorrupção* no 1746: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10247652093723-Den%C3%BAncia-de-corrup%C3%A7%C3%A3o-e-ou-improbidade-administrativa
 
  * Clique em “Solicitar anonimamente” ou faça login.
  * Descreva o fiscal, o local, data, valores pedidos e anexe provas (fotos, vídeos, recibos).
 
 * Se não conseguir anexar tudo, envie os arquivos para denuncia.subip@rio.rj.gov.br citando o protocolo.
 
 * Acompanhe o caso no portal ou ligue *1746*.
 
 Prazo inicial de resposta: até 30 dias. A denúncia é *sigilosa* e pode ser anônima.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Que situação revoltante. Isso é inaceitável e você está certo em denunciar. A Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro possui um canal específico para isso, garantindo seu anonimato.

Você pode formalizar a denúncia de corrupção na *Central Anticorrupção* pelos seguintes meios:

1.  **Online (Recomendado):**
    Acesse o *Portal 1746* e procure pelo serviço "Denúncia de corrupção". O link direto é: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10247652093723

2.  **Telefone:**
    Ligue para o número **(21) 2976-2976**, de segunda a sexta, das 10h às 17h.

3.  **E-mail:**
    Envie sua denúncia detalhada para o e-mail: *atuoparaaeticacarioca.cgm@pcrj.rj.gov.br*

Ao denunciar, forneça o máximo de detalhes possível, como o nome do fiscal (se você tiver), data, hora, local e uma descrição do ocorrido. Sua denúncia é *totalmente anônima* e segura.

tool_return.text:
Para denunciar um fiscal da prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro por corrupção, os cidadãos podem utilizar os canais oficiais disponibilizados pela Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro. A Central Anticorrupção da Prefeitura, acessível através do Portal Rio 1746, é uma ferramenta destinada a receber denúncias sobre fraudes, corrupção, prática de crimes, violação de normas, leis ou qualquer outro ato ilícito praticado contra a Administração Pública Municipal ou por seus agentes públicos.

Os cidadãos podem [1] registrar suas denúncias de diversas formas:
*   **Online:** Através do Portal Rio 1746, onde é possível preencher um formulário detalhado. O portal também permite o envio de denúncias anonimamente. O site da Prefeitura (prefeitura [1].rio) também oferece um ícone para o serviço "Anticorrupção Carioca".
*   **Por E-mail:** Denúncias podem [2] ser enviadas para atuoparaaeticacarioca.cgm@pcrj.rj.gov.br.
*   **Por Telefone:** O número  [2](21) 2976-2976 está disponível para o registro de denúncias, funcionando em dias úteis, das 10h às 17h. O número geral para contato com a Central [2] 1746 é 1746 (dentro do município do Rio de Janeiro) ou (21) 3460-1746 (para outras localidades).

A Prefeitura garante um ambiente seguro [2] contra retaliações para quem denuncia de boa-fé. É importante que a denúncia seja o mais detalhada [2] possível para aumentar as chances de comprovação dos fatos. Ao enviar a denúncia, um número de protocolo é gerado [1], o qual deve ser anotado para acompanhamento. As denúncias são encaminhadas à Subsecretaria de Integridade [1] Pública para avaliação e providências.

Para reclamações, críticas, elogios ou sugestões sobre serviços [1] públicos municipais que não se enquadram em atos de corrupção, o canal da Ouvidoria da Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro deve ser utilizado.

O serviço "Disque Rio Contra a Corrupção" (telefone 2276-6556) é um [3] canal do Governo do Estado do Rio de Janeiro para denúncias de corrupção envolvendo servidores do Poder Executivo Estadual.

A data da pesquisa é 8 de agosto de 2025. [4]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10247652093723-Den%C3%BAncia-de-corrup%C3%A7%C3%A3o-e-ou-improbidade-administrativa)
 - [2] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/cidade/servico-de-denuncias-anticorrupcao-carioca-comeca-a-receber-denuncias-tambem-pelo-site-da-prefeitura/)

1.  **Pelo site:** Acesse o portal *1746.rio*. Logo na página inicial, você encontrará a opção para consultar sua solicitação usando o *número do protocolo*.

2.  **Pelo aplicativo:** Baixe o app *1746* (disponível para Android e iOS), onde também é possível acompanhar o seu pedido.

3.  **Por telefone:** Ligue para o número **1746**. Se estiver ligando de fora da cidade do Rio, o número é **(21) 3460-1746** (a ligação terá custo de uma chamada local).

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

**Topic:** How to check the status of a service request (chamado) online via 1746 in Rio de Janeiro.

To consult the status of a service request (chamado) made through the 1746 service in Rio de Janeiro, citizens have multiple options:

1.  **Via the 1746 Portal:** The official 1746 portal allows users to track the progress of their requests. Users can access the "Acompanhe sua Solicitação" section on the portal's homepage. By entering the protocol number, individuals can view the status of their request. The [1] portal has been updated to make this process more direct, allowing for protocol consultation immediately on the first page.
 [2]
2.  **Via the 1746 Mobile Application:** The 1746 mobile application, available for Android and iOS, also provides the functionality to track the progress of submitted requests.
 [1]
3.  **Via Telephone:** The 1746 service can be contacted by phone to inquire about the status of a request. For [1] calls within the Municipality of Rio de Janeiro, the number is 1746. For other locations, the number is (21) 3460-1746. It [3] is important to note that calls to these numbers are charged at the rate of a landline call.
 [3]
When a request is made, the system is designed to send email and SMS notifications to the citizen, provided they have supplied their email address and mobile phone number in their registration. These notifications include the protocol number, the service requested, the expected service time, and the response from the relevant department.
 [1]
The 1746 service is part of the Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro's efforts to facilitate citizen access to public services through user-friendly platforms. The [2] portal and application aim to streamline the process of opening and tracking service requests. [2]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/9673060431131-05-Como-acompanhar-o-andamento-da-solicita%C3%A7%C3%A3o)

task_data.prompt: to querendo levantar o muro da minha casa, qual a altura maxima que pode ter? tem alguma lei sobre isso?
task_data.golden_answer:
Oi! Para muros voltados para a rua:
 
 * *Altura opaca* (alvenaria/chapisco): até *1,30 m*
 * Acima disso só gradil ou elemento vazado, podendo chegar a *2,20 m* de altura total
 * O fechamento deve ficar dentro do lote, respeitar o alinhamento do passeio e não bloquear a visibilidade de pedestres / veículos.
 
 *Base legal:* Código de Obras e Edificações Simplificado – COES (Lei Complementar 198/2019) e Decreto Rio 45 917/2019. Texto completo: https://prefeitura.rio/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Novo-Código-de-Obras-e-Edificações-do-Rio.pdf

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! A altura máxima para o muro da sua casa no Rio de Janeiro depende da sua localização no terreno.

A principal referência é o *Código de Obras e Edificações (Lei Complementar 198/2019)*. As regras gerais são:

- **Muros no recuo frontal** (na frente do terreno): A altura máxima permitida é de *3,00 metros*, medidos a partir do nível natural do terreno.

- **Muros nas divisas laterais e de fundos**: A altura é limitada ao nível da laje do segundo andar da sua casa. Além disso, devem ter um afastamento mínimo de 2,50 metros da divisa do terreno.

- **Cercas na frente do imóvel**: Devem ter uma altura mínima de 1,80 metros.

⚠️ *Atenção:* Se seu imóvel fica próximo a um patrimônio histórico, em área de proteção ambiental ou acima de 100 metros de altitude, a construção do muro precisa de uma avaliação prévia dos órgãos ambientais da prefeitura.

Para evitar problemas, é fundamental que a obra seja licenciada. Você gostaria de informações sobre como *licenciar a construção*?

**Research Artifact**

**Maximum Height of Residential Walls in Rio de Janeiro According to Law**

The regulations concerning the maximum height of residential walls in Rio de Janeiro are primarily detailed in RESOLUÇÃO Nº 042, DE 21 DE AGOSTO DE 1986, issued by the CEUSO (Comissão de Estudo do Uso do Solo Urbano), alongside provisions in more recent codes.

According to the 1986 CEUSO resolution:
*   The maximum height for walls on the side and rear boundaries of properties, including those supporting pergolas, is limited to the level of the slab of the 2nd floor.
*  [1]  In areas designated for front setbacks, boundary walls are restricted to a maximum height of 3.00 meters, measured from the natural terrain profile. This 3.00-meter limit also applies to terrains with slopes, calculated from the natural terrain profile within the front setback area.

The [1] Código de Obras e Edificações Simplificado (COES), established by Lei Complementar Nº 198 of January 14, 2019, provides further specifications. For equipment and meters installed in the front setback, a maximum height of two meters and ten centimeters (2.10m) is permitted, provided certain conditions are met. This legislation [1] also stipulates that walls on side and rear boundaries must maintain a minimum distance of two meters and fifty centimeters (2.50m) from the property line. If these walls are intended for ventilation or lighting, they must be at least one-fifth of the building's height.

Furthermore [1], Lei Ordinária Nº 1638, enacted on December 27, 1990, mandates a minimum height of 1.80 meters for fences located at the front of a property, with live fences having a minimum height of 80 centimeters. This law [2] also indicates that the construction of walls in proximity to heritage sites, environmental preservation areas, or at elevations above 100 meters requires prior assessment by the relevant municipal environmental authorities.

The current [2] date of this research is August 8, 2025.

task_data.prompt: queria deixar um elogio pra uma funcionaria do cras de bangu, ela me ajudou muito! como eu faço?
task_data.golden_answer:
Para registrar um elogio à funcionária do CRAS Bangu:
 
 * Acesse o formulário oficial *Elogio* no Portal 1746: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/13791534748187-Elogio
 * Clique em “Solicitar anonimamente” ou entre com seu cadastro.
 * No campo *Assunto*, selecione “Assistência Social” > “CRAS Bangu”.
 * Descreva o atendimento, confirme e envie. Você receberá um *número de protocolo* para acompanhar sua manifestação.
 
 Se preferir, ligue *1746* (ou 21 3460-1746 se estiver fora da cidade) e solicite o registro do elogio.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Que legal que você teve uma boa experiência e quer reconhecê-la! Fico feliz em ajudar. 😊

Para registrar um elogio a um funcionário da Prefeitura, o canal oficial é a **Ouvidoria da Central 1746**.

*Como fazer o elogio:*
1.  **Ligue 1746**: Você pode ligar para o número 1746 e registrar o elogio por telefone.
2.  **Portal 1746**: Acesse o site *www.1746.rio* e procure pela opção de "Elogio" na seção da Ouvidoria.

Ao registrar, informe o nome da funcionária e a unidade (*CRAS de Bangu*) para que o elogio seja direcionado corretamente. Sua atitude é muito importante para o serviço público

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

**Research Topic:** How to compliment an employee of the Rio de Janeiro City Hall.

To compliment an employee of the Rio de Janeiro City Hall, citizens can utilize the Ouvidoria (Ombudsman) channels, which serve as a second instance of relationship between the City Hall and the public. The Ouvidoria accepts compliments, suggestions, criticisms, and complaints regarding public services and administration acts [1].

The primary channel for these manifestations is the Central de Atendimento 1746. This service can be accessed via:
*   **Telephone:** Dialing 1746 within the Municipality of Rio de Janeiro, or (21) 3460-1746 from other locations. Please note that calls to these numbers are charged at the cost of a landline call [1].
*   **Portal Rio 1746:** The official website for the service, where citizens can submit their feedback [1].
*   **Mobile Application:** The 1746 service is also available through a mobile application [1].
*   **WhatsApp:** The Central 1746 can be contacted via WhatsApp [1].

The Portal Rio 1746 allows users to submit an "Elogio" (compliment) as a demonstration of recognition or satisfaction with the acts of the Administration [1]. When using the portal, users may be prompted to log in or can choose to submit their compliment anonymously [1]. The platform is designed to allow citizens to make requests for services and information, as well as register complaints, criticisms, denunciations, compliments, and suggestions to the City Hall's Ouvidoria [2].

The Ouvidoria itself is defined as an instrument of participation and social control, with the Ombudsman acting as a liaison between the citizen and the Public Administration [3]. The act of complimenting is specifically described as a "demonstração, reconhecimento ou satisfação sobre os atos da Administração" (demonstration, recognition, or satisfaction regarding the acts of the Administration).

The [1] Fala.BR platform is another integrated system for Ombudsman and Access to Information, where citizens can submit various types of manifestations, including compliments, to public bodies.

The [3] City Hall of Rio de Janeiro also has an Ouvidoria Geral (General Ombudsman) located at Rua Beatriz Larragoiti Lucas, 121, 8º andar, Cidade Nova – Rio de Janeiro – RJ, CEP: 20211-175, with a general contact telephone number of 3460-1746 and operating hours from Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM. [3]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/p/ouvidoria)
 - [2] [cgu.gov.br](https://falabr.cgu.gov.br/web/home)

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

**Research Topic:** Problemas com o aplicativo 1746

The 1746 application, designed to facilitate citizen interaction with the Rio de Janeiro City Hall for public services, has been subject to considerable user criticism regarding its performance and usability [1]. Although it was initially well-received, user reviews indicate a deterioration in its functionality, with frequent reports of bugs, crashes, and an overall negative user experience [1].

Users have specifically highlighted issues such as the application unexpectedly closing during operation, screens becoming unreadable due to black backgrounds and faint gray text, and the persistent appearance of nonsensical error messages, notably "não é possível recuperar dados" (it is not possible to recover data). Some [1] users have explicitly stated that the app "no longer works" and that these recurring error messages render it unusable. One [1] user expressed frustration that the app had ceased to function, lamenting the loss of a tool that aids in city oversight and calling for an urgent fix.

The [2] municipal government provides a specific service for "Solicitação de correção de falhas e de cadastro no portal e app 1746" (Request for correction of failures and registration in the 1746 portal and app) to address access problems, login errors, and issues related to email or password changes. This service also aims to resolve problems concerning application slowness, difficulties in retrieving the history of requests, and errors related to addresses. The anticipated [3] resolution time for these issues is up to 5 business days.

The 1746 [3] application enables citizens to request over a thousand types of municipal public services and to track the progress of their submissions. For technical [4] assistance, users can contact the app via email at 1746mobile@rio.rj.gov.br. The most [4] recent update for the application was on August 4, 2023.

Despite [4] its intended purpose, user feedback indicates a substantial level of dissatisfaction, with some users describing the city's services as disorganized and the application as non-functional. According [1] to the app's privacy policy, the developer, EMPRESA MUNICIPAL DE INFORMATICA SA - IPLANRIO, states that it does not collect data that is shared with third parties, although it may collect personal information, and the data is not encrypted. [4]

 Primeiro, busque no *Portal da Transparência* (Despesas > Contratos):
 https://transparencia.prefeitura.rio/
 
 Se não achar, abra um *Pedido de Acesso à Informação* no 1746:
 https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/9567624997403-Pedido-de-Acesso-%C3%A0-Informa%C3%A7%C3%A3o
 
 * Entre ou cadastre-se

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Sim, você está correto. A Prefeitura tem o dever de fornecer essas informações, com base na *Lei de Acesso à Informação (LAI)*.

Para solicitar oficialmente o custo da obra, você pode fazer um *Pedido de Acesso à Informação*. O canal principal e recomendado é o *Portal 1746*.

*Como solicitar:*
Acesse o serviço "Pedido de Acesso à Informação" no link: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/9567624997403

*O que você precisa informar no pedido:*
- Seu nome completo e CPF.
- O endereço exato da praça e, se possível, o período em que a reforma ocorreu.
- Descreva de forma clara a informação que você deseja (o custo detalhado da reforma).

O órgão tem o prazo de até **20 dias** para responder, podendo ser prorrogado por mais 10 dias. A solicitação é gratuita. ✅

tool_return.text:
## Research Artifact: Requesting Information via the Law of Access to Information (LAI) in the Rio de Janeiro City Hall

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

To request information from the Rio de Janeiro City Hall under the Law of Access to Information (LAI), any individual, regardless of age or nationality, as well as legal entities, companies, and organizations, has the right to do so [1]. The LAI, Federal Law No. 12.527/2011, establishes that access to public information is the rule, and secrecy is the exception [1]. Requests do not require any justification, and the provision of information is generally free of charge, with the exception of potential reproduction costs [1].

### How to Make a Request:

Requests for information can be submitted through several channels:

*   **Online Portal:** The primary method is through the 1746 portal, which is the central citizen service channel for the City of Rio de Janeiro [2].
*   **In-Person:** For those who prefer or lack online access, requests can be made in person at the Protocol sector of the relevant municipal body. A standard form for requesting public information must be completed, which will then be processed by the Citizen Information Service (SIC) [3].

When making a request, it is important to provide:
*   Full Name
*   CPF or CNPJ
*   A clear and objective description of the information sought, specifying whether it is of particular, collective, or general interest [3].

It is crucial to note that each request should pertain to a single piece of information [1].

### What Can and Cannot Be Requested:

*   **Permitted Requests:** Any information produced or held by the public administration, unless legally classified as secret [1].
*   **Prohibited Requests:**
    *   Requests for provisions or public services; these should be directed to the Central 1746 for appropriate routing [1].
    *   Complaints, criticisms, compliments, or suggestions, which should be submitted to the relevant Ombudsman's office [1].
    *   Consultations regarding the application of legislation [1].
    *   Denunciations of illicit acts [1].
    *   Information that does not exist or is still under development [3].
    *   Generic requests that are too broad to define the scope of the inquiry [3].
    *   Requests that necessitate additional analytical, interpretative, or data consolidation work beyond the scope of the body's responsibilities [3].

### Response Timelines and Appeals:

*   **Response Time:** If the requested information is readily available, it must be provided immediately [1]. If immediate provision is not possible, the responsible body has a maximum of 20 days to respond. This period can be extended by an additional 10 days if a justified reason is provided [1].
*   **Appeals:** If a request is denied or if there is an omission in the response, an appeal process is available [3].
    *   **First Instance:** An appeal must be filed within 10 days of receiving the body's response and should be addressed to the highest-ranking official of that body, who must respond within 5 days. If the body fails to respond within the legal timeframe, the appeal period begins 30 days after the initial request was made [3].
    *   **Second Instance:** If the first-instance appeal is denied or not addressed, a further appeal can be lodged with the Municipal Information Review Commission (CORE-Rio) within 10 days. CORE-Rio is expected to issue its opinion within 10 days [3].

### Legal Framework:

The process for requesting information is governed by Federal Law No. 12.527/2011 (LAI) [1]. At the municipal level, this law is regulated by Decree No. 44.745/2018 [1]. Additionally, Decree No. 35.606, issued on May 15, 2012, also serves to regulate the federal LAI within the municipality [4].

### Monitoring and Oversight:

The Ombudsman plays a role in verifying LAI compliance and recommending improvements to the process [1]. The Technical Coordination of Access to Information (CTAI), part of the Municipal Civil House Secretariat, is tasked with monitoring the implementation of the LAI across the entire Municipal Executive Branch and fostering a culture of transparency [1].

It is advisable to first check the "Portal da Transparência Rio" or the specific municipal body's website to see if the desired information has already been published before submitting a formal LAI request. [5]

task_data.golden_answer:

  https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10221320061979-Fiscalizacao-de-perturbacao-do-sossego
  Informe endereço completo, nome do bar, dias/horários do ruído e tipo de som. Prazo de atendimento: até 7 dias.
 
 * *Atividade Econômica sem Alvará*: se o bar funciona sem licença, use
  https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10221222516123-Fiscalizacao-de-atividades-economicas-sem-alvara
  Informe endereço, atividade e horários. Prazo de resposta: até 30 dias.
 
 1. Clique em “Solicitar” (pode ser anônimo).
 2. Preencha todos os dados exigidos.
 3. Guarde ou consulte o número de protocolo para acompanhar o pedido.

Olá! Você pode e deve solicitar a fiscalização para esse barulhento e para a suspeita de falta de alvará. O canal oficial da Prefeitura para isso é a *Central 1746*.

*Como denunciar:*
1.  **Ligue 1746:** A forma mais direta é ligar para o número *1746* e registrar a sua queixa.
2.  **Online:** Acesse o portal e procure pelo serviço "Denunciar barulho excessivo" ou "Fiscalização de estabelecimentos". O link direto para o serviço de poluição sonora é: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360001038232

*Informações importantes para a denúncia:*
- **Endereço completo** do bar, com ponto de referência se possível.
- **Dias e horários** em que o barulho costuma ocorrer.
- **Descreva a situação**, mencionando o barulho alto e a sua suspeita sobre a falta de alvará.

Sua denúncia é *totalmente anônima* e você receberá um número de protocolo para acompanhar o andamento da fiscalização.

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

**Research Topic:** Denunciar barulho de bar na prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro

**Summary of Findings:**

To report noise disturbances from bars in Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize the municipal service channel "1746" [1]. The Guarda Municipal do Rio de Janeiro (GM-Rio) is responsible for fiscalizing disturbances to public tranquility, including excessive noise from establishments like bars [1]. This fiscalization is conducted under Municipal Law 6.179/2017, regulated by Decree No. 43.372/2017 and further by Decree RIO nº 51.136/2022. [2]

The "1746" service, accessible via phone or the "1746 Rio" application, is the primary channel for lodging complaints regarding noise pollution and disturbances to public order. [1] The Portal Carioca Digital also lists "Denunciar ruído em excesso" as a service managed by the GM-Rio, accessible through the 1746 system.
 [1]
When making a complaint, it is advisable to provide specific details such as the day and time of the occurrences to facilitate effective inspection. The [1] required information for opening a complaint typically includes the address of the incident, the name of the establishment, the source of the noise (e.g., live music, sound systems), the days and times of the irregularity, and an estimated number of people present.
 [2]
It is important to note that while the GM-Rio handles disturbances from bars, restaurants, and similar establishments, the Secretaria Municipal de Meio Ambiente (SMAC) is responsible for noise pollution originating from activities requiring environmental licensing, such as industries, workshops, and large construction works. The [1] SMAC does not handle issues related to bars, restaurants, or general neighborhood disturbances; these fall under the purview of "Perturbação do Sossego" which is handled by the GM-Rio via the 1746 channel.

Penalties [3] for violations can include fines ranging from R$ 545.93 to R$ 5,459.93, with potential doubling for repeat offenses. For legal entities like bars and restaurants, sanctions can extend to partial or total interdiction and revocation of their operating licenses.

Other [2] avenues for reporting include the Ministério Público (Public Prosecutor's Office), which can be contacted online or in person, and potentially legal action if other methods fail, requiring evidence such as witness testimony and expert reports. [4]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/objetivo/denunciar-barulho/)
 - [2] [prefeitura.rio](https://guardamunicipal.prefeitura.rio/perturbacao-do-sossego/)
 - [3] [youtube.com](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9ckQUz4mGGk)
 - [4] [sindiconet.com.br](https://www.sindiconet.com.br/pagina-nao-encontrada.html)

task_data.prompt: a gente quer fazer uma festa junina aqui na rua, fechar um pedaço dela. precisa de autorização da prefeitura? como faz pra conseguir?
task_data.golden_answer:
Sim. Para fechar um trecho da rua e realizar a festa junina é obrigatório obter o *Alvará de Autorização Transitória* (licenciamento de eventos).
 
 1. Acesse o serviço “Licenciamento de eventos – Autorização Transitória” em:
  https://carioca.rio/servicos/alvara-transitorio-de-eventos/
  Clique em “Acessar o serviço” e preencha a *Consulta Prévia de Eventos* com data, horário, público estimado e o trecho da via a ser interditado.
 2. Após aprovação da Consulta, abra a Solicitação de Alvará, anexe:
 
  * planta/desenho do trecho,
  * autodeclarações (limpeza, banheiros etc.),
  * arquivos exigidos e solicite o *Nada a Opor* da CET-Rio (gerado dentro do próprio sistema para casos com impacto no trânsito).
 3. Pague a taxa indicada (TLE ou TUAP) via DARM e imprima o alvará no portal.
 
 *Prazos mínimos para enviar a Consulta Prévia* (contados em dias **úteis** antes do início da montagem):
 
 * até 300 pessoas: 7 dias
 * 301 – 2 000 pessoas: 10 dias
 * 2 001 – 10 000 pessoas: 15 dias
 
 Tenha o alvará impresso no local durante o evento.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Sim, para realizar uma festa junina ou qualquer evento que feche um trecho da rua, é *obrigatório* ter uma autorização da Prefeitura.

O processo é feito pela internet, através do sistema *Rio Mais Fácil Eventos*.

*Como solicitar:*
1.  Acesse o portal *Carioca Digital* e procure pelo serviço *Rio Mais Fácil Eventos*.
2.  Inicie uma *"Consulta Prévia de Evento"* para verificar a viabilidade no local desejado.
3.  Preencha o formulário com os detalhes da festa: dia, horário e o trecho exato da rua.

*Fique atento:*
- A solicitação deve ser feita com antecedência, pois o processo pode levar até 60 dias.
- O pedido será analisado por vários órgãos, como a *CET-Rio*, para garantir que o trânsito não seja prejudicado.

O pedido deve ser feito pelo responsável do evento, que precisará informar o CPF ou CNPJ.

Para iniciar a consulta, acesse: https://carioca.rio/servicos/rio-mais-facil-eventos-consulta-previa-de-evento/

## Research Artifact: Authorization for Street Closures for Festas Juninas in Rio de Janeiro

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

To close a street for a *festa junina* in Rio de Janeiro, authorization from the municipal government is required. The process for obtaining such authorization falls under the general regulations for event licensing and street closures within the city [1].

**Governing Regulations and Platforms:**
The authorization for events in public and private areas in Rio de Janeiro is governed by decrees, including Decreto Rio Nº 51.958 of January 24, 2023, and Decreto Rio Nº 55.648 of January 13, 2025. These [2] regulations stipulate that *festas juninas*, like other events, require proper authorization. The [2] primary digital platform for managing these procedures is the Carioca Digital portal, which hosts the "Rio Mais Fácil Eventos" system.

 [2]**Application Process:**
The general procedure for obtaining authorization involves:
1.  **Formal Request:** A formal request must be submitted to the prefecture or the relevant traffic authority, detailing the reason for the closure, the specific date and time, and the exact section of the street to be closed.
2 [3].  **Preliminary Consultation:** A crucial step is the "Consulta Prévia de Evento" (Event Preliminary Consultation), which can be initiated through the Carioca Digital portal. This [2] consultation assesses the feasibility and impact of the proposed event.
3.  **Inter-agency Consultation:** The process often involves consultations with various municipal bodies, including the Companhia de Engenharia de Tráfego do Rio de Janeiro (CET-Rio) for traffic impact assessment and authorization, and potentially Subprefeituras for local planning.
4.  [1] **Authorization Issuance:** Upon successful review and approval from relevant departments, the authorization is granted. This authorization is typically temporary and may be subject to cancellation if deemed necessary by the public administration.

**Key [3] Requirements and Documentation:**
While specific requirements for *festas juninas* may vary, general event authorization typically necessitates:
*   A formal application or requerimento (request).
*   [3] The CNPJ (for legal entities) or CPF (for individuals) of the event promoter.
*   [3] A site plan (Planta de situação) indicating the area to be used or affected by the event.
*   A [4] safety plan (Plano de Segurança) detailing security measures.
*   Proof [3] of payment for applicable municipal fees.
*   Approval [3] from the Corpo de Bombeiros (Fire Department) may also be required.

It is [4] important to note that street closures must not negatively impact public transportation, cargo transport, schools, hospitals, or other essential public services. The authorization [3] process can take up to 60 days from the opening of the process.

**Responsible [1] Bodies:**
The primary responsibility for authorizing street closures for events lies with the Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro (Rio de Janeiro Prefecture), with specific operational aspects managed by bodies such as CET-Rio and the Subprefeituras. The Coordenadoria [1] Especial de Promoção de Eventos (GP/CEPEV) is also involved in reviewing event consultations. [3]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [rio.rj.gov.br](http://www.rio.rj.gov.br/web/guest/exibeconteudo?article-id=1871449)
 - [2] [rio.rj.gov.br](https://doweb.rio.rj.gov.br/apifront/portal/edicoes/imprimir_materia/1128691/6902)

task_data.prompt: minha licença de ambulante ta pra vencer. o que eu preciso fazer pra renovar? tem que pagar alguma coisa?
task_data.golden_answer:
*Renove sua licença assim*:
 
 1. Entre no Carioca Digital > serviço *Formulário Ambulante – Alteração* (https://carioca.rio/servicos/formulario-ambulante-alteracao/). Preencha o pedido e anexe RG, CPF e comprovante de residência.
 2. Depois de aprovado, o sistema gera o DARM da *Taxa de Uso de Área Pública (TUAP)* já com o valor do seu ponto.
 3. Pague a TUAP. Após a compensação, a licença renovada fica disponível para baixar no próprio portal (prazo médio: 30 dias).
 
 *Sim, a TUAP é obrigatória; sem quitação não há renovação.*

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:

1.  Acesse o portal *Carioca Digital* para emitir a guia de pagamento da TUAP.
2.  Mantenha seu cadastro sempre atualizado na plataforma.

*Documentos importantes para manter seu cadastro atualizado:*
- Identidade e CPF.
- Comprovante de residência no município do Rio de Janeiro.

O processo é feito principalmente online. Caso não encontre a opção de renovação ou tenha dúvidas sobre o pagamento, entre em contato com a *Central 1746* por telefone ou pelo aplicativo.

The process for renewing a street vendor license (licença para comércio ambulante) in Rio de Janeiro is primarily managed through the Carioca Digital platform and information is available via the Portal Rio 1746. Applications [1] for authorization and re-authorization of street vendor activities are typically initiated through this platform.
 [1]*   **Required Documentation:** For the initial authorization or re-authorization of a street vendor license, several documents are generally required. These include:
    *   Proof of residence in the Municipality of Rio de Janeiro (e.g., utility bills).
 [1]    *   A valid identity document.

The expected timeframe for this service is approximately 30 days after the receipt and analysis of the request by the responsible Regional Management of Licensing and Fiscalization.

Olá! Para abrir sua loja como MEI (Microempreendedor Individual), o processo do alvará no Rio é mais simples do que parece. ✅

Desde 2020, o MEI está *dispensado da emissão do alvará* físico para a maioria das atividades de baixo risco. No entanto, você ainda precisa fazer a **Consulta Prévia de Local** para garantir que sua atividade é permitida no endereço escolhido.

O processo é feito online no portal *Carioca Digital*:

1.  Acesse o site *carioca.rio* e faça o login com sua conta Gov.br.
2.  Procure pelo serviço "*Alvará: Consulta Prévia*" e inicie uma nova consulta.

*Informações que você vai precisar:*
- Número do seu *CNPJ de MEI*.
- Endereço completo do imóvel.
- A atividade exata que você vai exercer na loja.

Após a aprovação da consulta, será gerado o **Termo de Dispensa de Alvará**, que é o documento que comprova a regularidade do seu negócio.

Depois de resolver o alvará, o próximo passo costuma ser a emissão de notas fiscais. Você gostaria de informações sobre como o MEI pode emitir notas no Rio?

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** 2025-08-08

**Research Topic:** How to obtain a business operating license (alvará de funcionamento) for a Micro-entrepreneur Individual (MEI) in Rio de Janeiro.

**Summary:**

The process for obtaining a business operating license (alvará de funcionamento) for a Micro-entrepreneur Individual (MEI) in Rio de Janeiro involves several steps, primarily managed through the Carioca Digital portal. While MEIs are generally exempt from needing a physical operating license due to recent legal changes, they may still need to go through a licensing process if their specific activity requires it or if they wish to use services like the Nota Carioca system.

**Key Steps and Information:**

1.  **Dispensa de Alvará for MEI:** Since September 1, 2020, MEIs are generally dispensed from obtaining a physical operating license and are considered to have a definitive license upon formalization. This change was implemented to simplify the process for micro-entrepreneurs. However [1], this exemption does not absolve the MEI from complying with public authority requirements for regular operation.

2 [2].  **Carioca Digital Portal:** The primary platform for licensing procedures in Rio de Janeiro is the Carioca Digital portal (carioca.rio). To [3] initiate the process, users typically need to log in using their Gov.br account or a digital certificate.

3 [4].  **Consulta Prévia de Local (CPL):** Before applying for an operating license, a "Consulta Prévia de Local" (Prior Local Consultation) is often required. This step verifies if the intended business activity is permitted at the chosen location and if it complies with municipal regulations. This [4] involves accessing the "Alvará: Consulta Prévia" section on the Carioca Digital portal, initiating a new consultation, and providing business and address details.

4.   [4]**Solicitação de Alvará (License Application):** After a successful CPL, the next step is to formally request the operating license (Alvará), which also serves as the Inscrição Municipal (Municipal Registration). This is done [4] through the Carioca Digital portal by following the prompts for "solicitar alvará / constituir empresa".

5.  **Documentation [4]:** While specific documents may vary, general requirements for obtaining an alvará can include the company's CNPJ, and potentially other business-related documents depending on the activity. For MEI formalization [5] itself, essential documents include RG, CPF, contact details, business address, and income tax return information.

6.  **Fees:* [1]* MEIs are generally exempt from paying the Taxa de Licença para Estabelecimento (TLE). However, if a license [3] is required and not automatically dispensed, there might be associated fees, and the TLE would be generated after the CPL approval and payment.

7.  **Specific [5] Cases and Other Requirements:**
    *   **Nota Carioca:** If an MEI wishes to issue electronic invoices through the Nota Carioca system, they may need to obtain a licensing alvará from the Prefecture after which they can register on the Nota Carioca system. However, since September [3] 1, 2023, MEIs are directed to use the National Issuer for fiscal notes, and an alvará is not required for this.
    *   **High-Risk [2] Activities:** Activities considered high-risk may require prior inspection by competent public bodies.
    *   **Inscrição [3] Estadual:** MEIs in Rio de Janeiro engaged in activities generating ICMS must obtain a state registration (inscrição estadual) through the JUCERJA portal.

8.  **Process Timeline [5]:** After the CPL is approved and the application is submitted, the alvará may be available within 48 hours after payment of any applicable fees.

**Official Sources:* [1]*

*   Carioca Digital Portal (carioca.rio)

*   Prefeitura do Rio de [3] Janeiro

tool_return.text:
## Research Artifact: Soliciting Pothole Repair from the Rio de Janeiro City Hall

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

To request pothole repair from the Prefeitura da Cidade do Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize the integrated service channel **1746** [1]. This service is accessible through multiple platforms:

*   **Telephone:** Dialing 1746 within the municipality of Rio de Janeiro. For other locations, the number is (21) 3460-1746. Calls to these numbers are charged at the rate of a landline call [2].
*   **Mobile Application:** The "1746 Rio" application, available for Android and iOS devices, allows citizens to request services and track their progress [2].
*   **Website:** Requests can also be submitted through the official portal, www.1746.rio [2].

When submitting a request, it is important to provide specific details to facilitate the process [2]:

*   **Location:** The street name, neighborhood, and relevant reference points such as the house or establishment number directly in front of the pothole, or its location between specific streets or at an intersection.
*   **Condition:** Information regarding whether the pothole contains water and if it poses a risk of accident.
*   **Pavement Type:** The type of pavement affected (e.g., asphalt, cobblestone, dirt).

Upon receiving a request, a technical inspection will be conducted, which may lead to the requalification of the service and potential adjustments to the initial timeframe [2]. The expected response times for different types of repairs are as follows:

*   **Pothole Repair on the Road Surface:** Up to 6 business days [2].
*   **Asphalt Repair with Subsidence:** Up to 20 business days [2].
*   **Manhole Cover or Grate Leveling:** Up to 12 business days [2].
*   **General Sidewalk Pothole Supervision:** Up to 15 business days [3].

**Specific Scenarios and Reporting:**

*   For potholes caused by the work of utility companies (such as CEDAE, CEG, OI, LIGHT, GVT, NET), citizens should consult the subject "Conservation >> Public Roads >> Supervision of public service concessionaire works" [2].
*   Potholes located on sidewalks should be reported under the subject "Conservation >> Paving >> Sidewalk Pothole Supervision" [2].
*   For potholes on privatized roads, including Linha Amarela and Transolímpica, the relevant subject is "Works and Real Estate >> Works Supervision >> Supervision of Paving Maintenance of Privatized Roads". [3]
*   If a pothole is on a sidewalk made of Portuguese stone, the specific subtype "Conservation >> Paving >> Repair of pothole on Portuguese stone sidewalk" should be used. [3]

In cases where a pothole has caused damage to a vehicle that renders it immobile, citizens should contact CETRIO directly at 0800-282-8664 for vehicle towing and to assist with traffic flow. [2] The 1746 service operates 24 hours a day, seven days a week, providing free service across various regions of the city. [2]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [rio.rj.gov.br](http://www0.rio.rj.gov.br/pcrj/destaques/servicos/destaque_tapaburaco.htm)
 - [2] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/reparo-de-asfalto-com-deformacao-e-afundamento/)
 - [3] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10275708915099-Fiscaliza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-buraco-na-cal%C3%A7ada)

  * clique em “Solicitar Anonimamente” ou entre com seu login
  * informe: nome, e-mail, telefone e endereço completo com ponto de referência
 2. Se preferir, use o app 1746 (Android/iOS) ou ligue *1746*.
 
 *Prazo máximo para execução:* 240 dias. Se os galhos estiverem na rede elétrica, acione a Light. Para árvores dentro de terreno particular, a poda é responsabilidade do proprietário; veja orientações: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10800964823835-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-sobre-poda-de-%C3%A1rvores-em-%C3%A1reas-particulares

Ao solicitar, informe o endereço completo onde a árvore está, com um ponto de referência para facilitar a localização.

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date:** August 8, 2025

**Topic:** How to request tree pruning from the Rio de Janeiro City Hall.

To request tree pruning in Rio de Janeiro, the procedure depends on whether the tree is located in a public or private area.

**For trees in public areas (streets, squares, parks):**
The service for pruning or removing trees in public areas is managed by the Companhia Municipal de Limpeza Urbana (Comlurb) [1]. The request can be made through the following channels:
*   **Phone:** Call the central number 1746 [1]. For other locations, the number is (21) 3460-1746 [2].
*   **Online:** Access the Portal Rio 1746 website or the 1746 Rio smartphone application (available for Android and iOS) [1].
*   **WhatsApp:** Through the number (21) 3460-1746 [3].

When making the request, the following information is necessary:
*   Full name [4].
*   Email address [4].
*   Telephone number [4].
*   Complete address of the occurrence, including street name, number, neighborhood, and reference points [4].
*   For each tree, the specific address where it is located and a reference point should be provided [3].

The service involves an evaluation by a Forest Engineer or Agronomist to determine the necessity of pruning. If approved, the tree management (pruning) will be carried out according to the technical report [4]. The expected timeframe for this service is up to 240 calendar days [4]. If the tree is near the electrical grid, Comlurb will await the power line shutdown by LIGHT to perform the pruning safely [3].

**For trees in private areas:**
The owner is responsible for pruning trees on their private property [3]. According to the Portal Rio 1746, pruning trees in private areas does not require authorization from the Fundação Parques e Jardins (FPJ), as stipulated by Article 6 of Decree No. 28.328/2007. However [5], private pruning must adhere to Brazilian Standard NBR 16246-1 and SMAC Resolution No. 613/2016.
 [3]
Pruning in private areas is typically indicated when the plant is affected by pests, has dry or rotten parts, or interferes with the safety of people and properties. It [3] is recommended to hire a qualified arboriculture professional or gardener for this service. A [3] drastic pruning that damages the tree or removal without authorization can result in fines and penalties from the Environmental Patrol. The [3] FPJ can provide a list of accredited professionals for safe service execution.
 [3]
If a tree in a private area is near the electrical grid, it is advised to contact LIGHT to assess the cutting of branches compromising the network.
 [3]
**For tree removal in public or private areas:**
For tree removal, especially in private areas, an authorization process through the FPJ might be required, involving a technical inspection, payment of a fee, and potentially compensatory planting. For [5] public areas, the process is similar, requiring an application to the FPJ, technical evaluation, and potential authorization issuance.
 [5]
It is important to note that the Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro does not perform pruning services for trees that are causing problems with the electrical grid; in such cases, direct contact with LIGHT is necessary. Similarly [3], if tree roots are suspected of damaging sewage or gas lines, or causing structural damage to properties, specific contacts with CEDAE/Águas do Rio, Naturgy, or the Civil Defense should be made, respectively. [3]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [bangunoticias.com.br](https://bangunoticias.com.br/precisa-podar-uma-arvore-no-rio-saiba-como-solicitar-o-servico-da-comlurb/)
 - [2] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/poda-e-remocao-de-arvores-em-areas-publicas/)
 - [3] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10220671680795-Poda-de-%C3%A1rvore-em-logradouro)
 - [4] [rio.rj.gov.br](http://www.rio.rj.gov.br/dlstatic/10112/2565214/4202602/SOLICITACAOPARAPODAEREMOCAOEMAREAPUBLICA.pdf)
 - [5] [rio.rj.gov.br](http://www.rio.rj.gov.br/dlstatic/10112/2565214/DLFE-240329.pdf/ProcedimentoRemocaodeArvoreParticularePublica.pdf)

Olá! Para solicitar a avaliação e o possível corte de uma árvore com risco de queda, o canal oficial da Prefeitura é a **Central 1746**.

*Como solicitar:*
1.  **Ligue 1746**: A forma mais direta é ligar para o número *1746* e registrar a sua solicitação.
2.  **Online**: Você pode abrir o chamado pelo portal, no serviço "Avaliação de risco de queda da árvore": https://carioca.rio/servicos/avaliacao-de-risco-de-queda-da-arvore/

*Informações importantes:*
- Ao solicitar, forneça o **endereço completo** com ponto de referência e descreva bem a situação de risco.

⚠️ Se o risco for **imediato** (ameaça de cair a qualquer momento), ligue diretamente para o **Corpo de Bombeiros**, no número *193*.

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

**Research Topic:** How to request the removal of a tree at risk of falling in Rio de Janeiro.

To request the removal of a tree that poses a risk of falling in Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize the city's official channels, primarily through the 1746 service or the Carioca Digital portal [1]. The process involves reporting the issue, which then triggers a technical evaluation by city officials [1].

**Procedure for Requesting Tree Removal:**

1.  **Reporting the Issue:**
    *   The primary method for reporting a tree with a risk of falling is through the **1746 service**, either by phone or via the **1746 Rio app** [1].
    *   Alternatively, the **Portal Carioca Digital** offers a service called "Avaliação de risco de queda da árvore" (Tree Fall Risk Assessment).
  [1]   *   When making the request, it is necessary to provide:
        *   Full name.
  [1]       *   Email address.
  [1]       *   Phone number.
  [1]       *   Complete address of the occurrence, including street name, number, neighborhood, and reference points.
  [1]       *   A description of the situation.

2 [2].  **Evaluation Process:**
    *   Upon receiving the report, the city will conduct a **vistoria (inspection)** and **avaliação (assessment)** of the tree's condition.
    [1] *   The expected timeframe for this evaluation and potential service execution is typically **up to 10 business days** if a fall risk is confirmed. Some [1] sources indicate up to 20 days for evaluation and service if removal is deemed necessary, or up [3] to 60 days for technical evaluation for public areas.

3. [2]  **Service Execution:**
    *   If the assessment confirms that the tree presents a risk of falling due to factors such as inclination, phytosanitary compromise, or pests, the removal service will be arranged.
    [1] *   The Companhia Municipal de Limpeza Urbana (COMLURB) is responsible for the management of urban trees in public areas, including the removal of trees with a risk of falling.
    [1] *   Trees located on private property are not serviced by COMLURB.

**Important [1] Considerations:**

*   **Areas Not Covered:** COMLURB does not service trees located on private properties. For [1] issues on private land, citizens may need to consult the Secretaria de Conservação e Meio Ambiente (Seconserma) or hire private professionals.
*   * [4]*Urgency and Safety:** In cases of immediate danger, such as a tree falling on power lines, coordination with the utility company (Light) may be required. For life [1]-threatening situations, the Fire Department (193) should be contacted.
*   * [2]*Tree Removal Criteria:** Only trees that are dead (dry), have a risk of falling due to inclination or phytosanitary issues, or are affected by pests or diseases are typically removed.
*   * [1]*Unauthorized Actions:** Cutting or pruning trees without proper authorization can lead to legal sanctions.

The process [1] aims to ensure the safety of public spaces by addressing trees that pose a significant risk to the community. The city [1] receives an average of ten calls per day regarding potential tree falls, indicating the importance of this service. [2]

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

**Research Topic:** Conserto de bueiro prefeitura rj (Sewer grate repair Rio de Janeiro city hall)

**Summary:**

The Rio de Janeiro City Hall addresses issues related to sewer grates and drains through its centralized service portal, **1746.rio** [1]. Citizens can report problems and request services via the 1746.rio website, the 1746 mobile application (available for Android and iOS), or by calling the service number 1746 or (21) 3460-1746 [1]. Calls to these numbers are charged at the rate of a landline call [1].

The specific services offered for sewer grate-related issues include "Manutenção/Desobstrução de ramais de águas pluviais e ralos" (Maintenance/Unclogging of rainwater and drain pipes) and "Reposição de tampão ou grelha" (Replacement of manhole cover or grate). These services [1] are intended to address issues such as blocked drains and pipes that cause water to back up or flood streets, as well as the replacement of broken, loose, or missing manhole covers and grates.

To request [1] these services, residents must provide specific information, including the neighborhood (bairro), street (rua), and the number of the residence or establishment located in front of the affected sewer grate. A reference point is also helpful. It is important [1] to specify whether the issue involves a round manhole cover in the middle of the street or a rectangular grate located near the curb.

Several [1] municipal bodies are involved in these maintenance and repair efforts, including the Secretaria Municipal de Infraestrutura (SMI), which is responsible for major municipal works and infrastructure maintenance, and Rio-Águas, which handles drainage and sanitation. The "Programa [1] Cuidar da Cidade" coordinates actions involving various secretariats and municipal bodies like Seconserma, Comlurb, Rio Águas, Cet-Rio, and Rio Luz to address citizen-reported issues.

The expected [2] response time for unclogging drains and pipes is up to 7 business days. For the replacement [1] of manhole covers or grates, the timeframe is up to 15 business days, depending on the severity of the issue.

It is important [3] to note that certain issues are excluded from these services. The exclusive cleaning of drain boxes for removing soil, sand, or debris falls under the responsibility of COMLURB. If a sewer [1] grate is emitting water without rain or has a foul odor, it may indicate a problem with public service concessionaires (like CEDAE or Zona Oeste Mais Saneamento), and the appropriate reporting channel would be for "Fiscalização de obras de concessionárias de serviços públicos". For watercourses [1] or rivers located on private property, the responsibility for cleaning and maintenance lies with the property owner.

In recent developments [1], the Prefeitura do Rio is testing plastic sewer grates as a measure to combat theft, as plastic lacks the commercial value of metal in scrap yards. [4]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [rio.rj.gov.br](http://www.rio.rj.gov.br/web/guest/exibeconteudo?id=1564781)
 - [2] [rio.rj.gov.br](http://www.rio.rj.gov.br/web/guest/exibeconteudo?id=8957297)
 - [3] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10221176323867-Manuten%C3%A7%C3%A3o-Desobstru%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-ramais-de-%C3%A1guas-pluviais-e-ralos)
 - [4] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/desobstrucao-de-galeria-de-aguas-pluviais/)

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** Friday, August 8, 2025

**Research Topic:** How to request an accessibility ramp from the Rio de Janeiro municipality.

To request the installation or repair of an accessibility ramp in public areas in Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize the services provided by the municipality through various channels [1]. The process involves submitting a request, which will be followed by an analysis and technical opinion from CET-RIO for inclusion in programming if it's a new ramp installation [1].

**Methods of Request:**
*   **Online Portal:** Requests can be made via the official website www.1746.rio [1].
*   **Mobile Application:** The 1746 Rio application, available for Android and iOS, can also be used to submit requests [1].
*   **Telephone:** Citizens can call the central atendimento number 1746. For those outside the municipality, the number is (21) 3460-1746 [1]. It is important to note that calls to these numbers are charged at the cost of a landline call [1].
*   **WhatsApp:** The 1746 service is also available via WhatsApp at (21) 3460-1746 [1].
*   **Regional Administration:** If direct digital or telephone access is not possible, requests can be made through a Regional Administration office [1].

**Information Required for Request:**
To initiate a request, the following information is necessary:
*   Neighborhood [1]
*   Street and number of the residence or establishment [1]
*   A reference point for the location [1]

**Service Timeline:**
The expected timeframe for the service is up to 15 business days [1].

**Relevant Municipal Bodies and Information:**
*   The **Portal Carioca Digital** and **Portal Rio 1746** are key platforms for accessing municipal services, including those related to public works and accessibility [1].
*   The **Secretaria Municipal de Obras e Conservação (SMO)** is one of the municipal secretariats involved in public works and infrastructure.
 [2]*   **CET-RIO** (Companhia de Engenharia de Tráfego do Rio de Janeiro) plays a role in the technical analysis for new ramp installations.
* [1]   The **Manual de Acessibilidade** developed by the Prefeitura do Rio aims to standardize and guide accessibility implementations within the city.

It [3] is also noted that the municipality has undertaken broader accessibility projects, such as the "Rotas Acessíveis" project, which involves adapting routes to tourist points with the installation of accessible sidewalks and ramps. The [1] city also has a process for issuing a "Certificado de Aceitação das Condições de Acessibilidade" for specific installations. [2]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/reparo-ou-instalacao-de-rampa-de-acesso-em-vias-publicas/)

task_data.prompt: como eu faço pra receber os alertas de chuva forte da defesa civil no meu celular? moro em area de risco.
task_data.golden_answer:
*Alerta de chuva forte*
 
 *SMS (recomendado)*
 
 * Envie seu CEP para *40199* (gratuito, vários CEPs).
 * Cancelar: SAIR + CEP.
 
 *WhatsApp*
 
 * Salve (61) 2034-4611 ou acesse https://wa.me/556120344611
 * Mande “Oi” e informe CEP/localização.
 
 *App COR.Rio (Alerta Rio)*
 
 * Baixe o app COR.Rio e ative as notificações.
 
 Detalhes: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10421078641307-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-sobre-mensagens-de-alerta-da-Defesa-Civil

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para receber os alertas de chuva e desastres da Defesa Civil diretamente no seu celular, você pode se cadastrar gratuitamente de duas formas:

1.  ***Via SMS (a mais comum):***
    *   Envie um SMS para o número **40199** contendo apenas os números do CEP da sua residência.
    *   Você receberá uma mensagem de confirmação e passará a receber os alertas para a sua região. É possível cadastrar mais de um CEP, enviando um por vez.

2.  ***Via WhatsApp:***
    *   Salve o número **(61) 2034-4611** no seu celular e envie uma mensagem, como "oi".
    *   Um assistente virtual responderá e você poderá compartilhar sua localização para receber os alertas.

O serviço é *totalmente gratuito* e fundamental para a sua segurança, especialmente em áreas de risco.
