tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** Friday, August 8, 2025

**Topic:** How to receive civil defense alerts on a mobile phone in Rio de Janeiro.

To receive civil defense alerts on a mobile phone in Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize an SMS-based service or the WhatsApp platform [1]. The alerts provide information on floods, landslides, and other natural disasters in registered areas [2].

**SMS Alerts:**
To subscribe to SMS alerts, send your CEP (postal code) via text message to the number 40199 [1]. It is possible to register multiple CEPs, but each must be sent individually [3]. The CEP should be sent with only numbers, without spaces or symbols [3]. Upon successful registration, a confirmation message will be sent, and alerts for that region will commence [2]. To cancel the service, send the word "SAIR" followed by the CEP to 40199 [2]. To check which CEPs are registered for a phone number, send the message "consultar" to 40199 [2].

**WhatsApp Alerts:**
For alerts via WhatsApp, users can register by contacting the number (61) 2034-4611 or by using the provided link: https://wa.me/556120344611 [3]. After initiating contact with the chatbot, users can share their current location or select another of interest to receive alerts from local civil defense agencies [2].

**Additional Information:**
The civil defense alerts are a free service [4]. The system is part of the Community Alert and Alarm System for Disaster Risk Reduction, which is based on pluviometer data and triggers alerts when rainfall reaches critical levels [2]. The alerts are typically brief, with a character limit of 160 characters [4]. The state of Rio de Janeiro has a significant number of registrations for this SMS alert service, with the goal of reaching one million CEPs registered [1]. The alerts can include predictions of weather changes, rain, wind, and potential electrical discharges [2].

The city of Rio de Janeiro also utilizes a "Cell Broadcast" technology for audible alerts, which is implemented on compatible mobile phones (typically those purchased after 2020) and can function even in silent mode [5]. However, this system does not require prior registration [5].

For further information or to access related services, the Portal Carioca Digital and the 1746 Rio application are available [3].

**Sources:**
 - [1] [Weather information for locality: Rio de Janeiro, administrative_area: RJ](https://www.google.com/search?q=weather+in+Rio%20de%20Janeiro,+RJ)
 - [2] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/informacoes-sobre-as-mensagens-de-alerta-da-defesa-civil/)
 - [3] [defesacivil.rj.gov.br](https://defesacivil.rj.gov.br/index.php/para-o-cidadao/receba-alertas-sms)
 - [4] [portalmultiplix.com](https://www.portalmultiplix.com/noticias/seguranca/saiba-como-receber-alerta-de-desastres-da-defesa-civil-via-sms)
 - [5] [youtube.com](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=20ydNzwXFtE)

task_data.prompt: minha casa encheu toda na chuva de ontem, perdi meus móveis. a defesa civil ajuda com alguma coisa? tem algum abrigo pra eu ficar com minha familia?
task_data.golden_answer:
Olá! Siga estes passos:
 
 1. Se ainda há risco, ligue *199* (Defesa Civil). Para vistoria e laudo, abra protocolo no 1746.
 2. Com o laudo, vá ao CRAS para entrar no *Proteção Social nas Emergências*, solicitar kits de ajuda (colchão, cesta básica) e o *Auxílio Habitacional Temporário* (aluguel social).
 3. Sem onde ficar? Procure a Central de Recepção 24 h (Estr. dos Maracajás 973, Ilha) ou peça encaminhamento.
 
 Links úteis:
 https://carioca.rio/servicos/programa-protecao-social-nas-emergencias/
 https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10246738056347-Aux%C3%ADlio-Habitacional-Tempor%C3%A1rio-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Sinto muito pela situação difícil que você e sua família estão passando. A Prefeitura oferece auxílio através de alguns órgãos.

A primeira e mais urgente medida é a segurança.
*Ligue imediatamente para a Defesa Civil (199)* para solicitar uma vistoria. Eles irão *avaliar os riscos do imóvel* e, se necessário, interditá-lo. Essa vistoria é fundamental para que você possa, futuramente, solicitar o *Aluguel Social*.

Sobre o abrigo, o caminho é o seguinte:
Você precisa procurar um *Centro de Referência de Assistência Social (CRAS)*. A equipe do CRAS irá avaliar a situação da sua família e fazer o *encaminhamento* para um *abrigo público* adequado.

Para te ajudar a encontrar o abrigo, **você gostaria que eu buscasse o endereço do CRAS mais próximo da sua casa?**

task_data.prompt: a defesa civil interditou minha casa, mas eu ja fiz a obra que pediram. como eu faço pra eles virem aqui de novo pra liberar?
task_data.golden_answer:
Para liberar o imóvel, solicite a *Desinterdição pela Defesa Civil*
 
 * Formulário: https://carioca.rio/servicos/solicitacao-de-desinterdicao-pela-defesa-civil/
 * Preencha em nome do engenheiro/arquiteto e anexe: *ART ou RRT*, *anuidade + carteira CREA/CAU*, *declaração de responsabilidade* e, para desinterdição definitiva, *laudo técnico + fotos*.
 * *Prazo*: até 72 h após enviar a documentação. Acompanhe pelos telefones 2298-9019 ou 2298-9487 ramal 224.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para solicitar a vistoria da Defesa Civil para liberar (desinterditar) seu imóvel, é necessário que um engenheiro ou arquiteto contratado por você faça o pedido formal à prefeitura.

O profissional deverá seguir estes passos:

1.  **Acessar o Portal Carioca Digital**: O pedido é feito online, através do serviço "Solicitação de Desinterdição pela Defesa Civil".
2.  **Anexar a Documentação Técnica**: Será preciso apresentar documentos como a *Anotação de Responsabilidade Técnica (ART)* ou *Registro de Responsabilidade Técnica (RRT)*, um laudo técnico com fotos que comprove a conclusão e segurança da obra, e a declaração de responsabilidade.

O prazo para análise do pedido é de até 72 horas após o envio da documentação completa pelo profissional. O serviço pode ser acessado em: *carioca.rio/servicos/solicitacao-de-desinterdicao-pela-defesa-civil*

Se precisar, o endereço da Defesa Civil é *Rua Visconde de Santa Isabel, 32, em Vila Isabel*.

content.name: google_search
content.arguments: {'query': 'como solicitar desinterdição de imóvel pela defesa civil rio de janeiro'}

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

**Research Topic:** Como solicitar desinterdição de imóvel pela Defesa Civil Rio de Janeiro (How to request property embargo removal by the Civil Defense of Rio de Janeiro)

To request the lifting of a property embargo (desinterdição) issued by the Civil Defense of Rio de Janeiro, the process is managed through the Portal Carioca Digital. This service is intended for properties that have been embargoed by the Civil Defense, and the request must be submitted by a qualified engineer or architect who will assume technical responsibility for the necessary remedial works or for the completed works that address the risks leading to the embargo.

**Procedure [1] for Requesting Desinterdição:**

The request is initiated by completing an electronic form available on the Portal Carioca Digital, accessible via the following link: `https://carioca.rio/servicos/solicitacao-de-desinterdicao-pela-defesa-civil/`. All required [1] documentation must be uploaded through this online platform for the relevant department to review. The outcome [1] of the request will be communicated to the applicant through the same portal.

**Required [1] Documentation:**

The following documents are mandatory for the desinterdição application:
*   Anotação de Responsabilidade Técnica (ART) or Registro de Responsabilidade Técnica (RRT), submitted in its original and a copy.
*   Proof of [1] the current year's annual fee payment for the relevant professional council (CREA/CAU), provided in original and copy.
*   The professional [1]'s CREA/CAU card, presented in original and copy.
*   A Declaration [1] of Technical Responsibility, which must clearly identify the professional and detail all the services that will be undertaken to rectify the risks that prompted the administrative embargo by the Civil Defense.
*   For definitive [1] desinterdição, a Technical Report of Work Completion, accompanied by a photographic report detailing the stages of the work, signed by the responsible technician, is required.

**Processing [1] Timeline:**

The expected turnaround time for processing the request is up to 72 hours after the complete documentation has been submitted.

**Contact Information [1]:**

For any queries regarding the status of the document issuance or for further assistance, individuals may contact the responsible department by phone at 4502-8829 or 98909-2677. Additionally, [1] the Gerência de Engenharia can be reached at 2298-9019 or 2298-9487 (Ramal 224). General inquiries [2] to the municipal government can also be directed to the 1746 service line. The Subsecretaria [2] de Proteção e Defesa Civil (SUBPDEC), the responsible body, is located at Rua Visconde de Santa Isabel, 32, Vila Isabel, Rio de Janeiro/RJ. For specific information [3] regarding an Auto de Interdição, visiting the headquarters of the Municipal Civil Defense at Rua Visconde de Santa Isabel nº 32, Vila Isabel, is recommended, with service hours from Monday to Friday, 9 am to 5 pm.

It is important to [4] note that the described process pertains to the *lifting* of an embargo (desinterdição), not the initial imposition of an embargo, which is carried out by the Civil Defense upon identification of risks. [5]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10834684708763-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-sobre-desinterdi%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-local-pela-Defesa-Civil)
 - [2] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/solicitacao-de-desinterdicao-pela-defesa-civil/)
 - [3] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/sections/10422246493211-Interdi%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-im%C3%B3vel)
 - [4] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/objetivo/desinterdicao-de-local-interditado/)
 - [5] [prefeitura.rio](https://defesacivil.prefeitura.rio/interditar-o-local-com-risco/)

Se você está vendo uma rachadura na encosta, acione a *Defesa Civil (199)* – atendimento 24 h – e solicite uma vistoria no local. Em caso de deslizamento em andamento, ligue *193 (Corpo de Bombeiros).*
 
 * Solicitar vistoria on-line: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10422149135003-Vistoria-em-amea%C3%A7a-de-deslizamento-de-barreira-encosta-talude

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Entendo a sua preocupação. Em situações como essa, você deve acionar a **Defesa Civil** imediatamente.

O número de emergência para risco de deslizamentos é o **199**. A ligação é gratuita e o serviço funciona 24 horas por dia.

Você também pode registrar a ocorrência na central da prefeitura, através do número **1746**.

Ao ligar, tenha em mãos o endereço completo do local, com pontos de referência, e descreva a situação da rachadura. Não se aproxime da área de risco.

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

**Research Topic:** Telefone de emergência para Defesa Civil no Rio de Janeiro em caso de deslizamento.

**Summary:**

The primary emergency contact number for the Civil Defense in Rio de Janeiro is **199**. [1] This number operates 24 hours a day and prioritizes cases of landslides and building collapses. [2]

For general citizen assistance and to report issues within the municipality of Rio de Janeiro, the central number is **1746**. [3] For locations outside the municipality of Rio de Janeiro, the contact number is (21) 3460-1746. [3]

The "Alerta Rio" system, managed by the Prefecture of Rio de Janeiro, provides alerts for intense rainfall and landslides. Residents can receive these alerts via SMS by sending their CEP (postal code) to **40199**. [2] This service is free and aims to inform the population about potential risks, allowing them to take preventative measures. [2] The system uses pluviometers and sirens in high-risk communities to warn residents of potential landslides. [2]

The Civil Defense also utilizes a system that sends extreme alerts directly to mobile phones, which can include notifications about heavy rainfall and guidance to use the emergency number 199 in case of emergencies. [4]

task_data.golden_answer:
*Prazo*
 
 * *Emergencial*: **até 24 h** (normalmente \~10 h)
 * *Preventiva*: **até 15 dias** (geralmente 7 dias).
 
 *Na vistoria*
 
 * Checam rachaduras, paredes, vigas, lajes
 * Infiltrações que comprometam a estrutura
 * Avaliam risco de desabamento; podem interditar, isolar ou escorar e orientar reparos.
 
 Boletim com o resultado fica disponível após a visita.
 
 Mais detalhes: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10421754087707-Vistoria-em-im%C3%B3vel-com-rachadura-e-infiltra%C3%A7%C3%A3o

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! O tempo para a vistoria da *Defesa Civil* e o que é analisado dependem da natureza do seu chamado.

*Prazos para a visita:*
- **Vistoria Preventiva:** Para casos de rachaduras, infiltrações ou outros problemas não emergenciais, o prazo é de até *15 dias corridos*.
- **Vistoria de Emergência:** Se houver risco iminente, a equipe vai ao local em até *24 horas*.

*O que eles avaliam:*
A vistoria é uma *análise técnica visual*, feita por engenheiros ou arquitetos, para identificar riscos à segurança do imóvel e dos moradores. Eles verificam:
- Ameaças de desabamento, deslizamento ou queda de estruturas.
- Rachaduras, infiltrações, afundamento de piso e outros sinais de danos estruturais.

Se for constatado um problema que não afeta a estrutura, a *Defesa Civil* pode orientar que você contrate um profissional particular para um laudo detalhado. Saiba mais no portal: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10421754087707.

Após a visita, você pode precisar de uma cópia do laudo técnico. Posso te ajudar com os passos para solicitar esse documento?

tool_return.text:
# Research Artifact: Prazo de Vistoria da Defesa Civil no Rio de Janeiro

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

The Subsecretaria de Proteção e Defesa Civil (SUBPDEC) of Rio de Janeiro conducts various types of inspections, each with specific response times and regulatory frameworks. These inspections are crucial for assessing risks, ensuring building safety, and implementing necessary preventive or emergency measures.

### Types of Vistorias and Their Timelines

The Defesa Civil performs different types of vistorias, with distinct expected response times:

*   **Vistoria Emergencial:** For situations posing immediate risks, the expected timeframe for an emergency inspection is up to 24 hours, with the possibility of reduction to 10 hours.
 [1]*   **Vistoria Preventiva:** For preventive checks or issues such as cracks and infiltrations, the expected timeframe is up to 15 calendar days, which can be reduced to 7 days.
 [1]*   **Vistoria Técnica Periódica (Autovistoria):** This type of inspection is mandated for buildings to ensure their conservation, stability, and safety. The law requires these periodic technical inspections to be carried out with a maximum interval of five years. Decree [2] nº 37.426/13, which regulates Laws Complementar nº 126/13 and nº 6.400/13, established that the deadline for the initial communication of these periodic technical inspections was July 1, 2014. The decree [2] itself set January 1, 2014, as a compliance deadline for its provisions, with subsequent inspections following the five-year cycle. Autovistoria [1] is specifically mandatory for buildings with three or more floors, or those with a built area of 1000m² or more, regardless of the number of floors. It also applies to all facades of buildings that have projections like marquees or balconies over public sidewalks.

### Scope [3] and Execution of Vistorias

The Defesa Civil's vistorias are primarily visual technical analyses conducted by engineers or architects. Their objective is to identify potential risks to people and property, leading to emergency measures such as interdictions, isolations, shoring, or demolitions if deemed necessary. For preventive [1] vistorias concerning issues like cracks or infiltrations, if the problem is solely infiltration without structural damage, the Defesa Civil's role is limited to a visual assessment, and citizens may need to hire a qualified professional for a detailed technical report.

For periodic [4] technical inspections (autovistoria), the responsibility for hiring a qualified engineer or architect lies with the building's owner, condominium, or occupant. The results [2] of these inspections, documented in a technical report, must be communicated to the Prefeitura.

### Obtaining [2] Inspection Reports

After a Defesa Civil inspection, citizens can request an authentic copy of the inspection report (Cópia Autêntica). This document details the visual technical assessment performed by the engineer or architect. The request for a Cópia Autêntica can be made through the Portal Carioca Digital or the 1746 service, with an expected turnaround time of up to 3 business days from the request. It is important [1] to note that a request for a copy of the report cannot be made simultaneously with the initial request for the inspection itself. [1]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/pdf/?_sft_gestores=secretaria-municipal-de-saude-subsecretaria-de-protecao-e-defesa-civil-subpdec)
 - [2] [rio.rj.gov.br](http://autovistoria.rio.rj.gov.br/)
 - [3] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10421754087707-Vistoria-em-im%C3%B3vel-com-rachadura-e-infiltra%C3%A7%C3%A3o)
 - [4] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/vistoria-em-edificacao-apresentando-diversas-formas-de-rachadura-ou-infiltracao/)

**Research Artifact: Obtaining a Duplicate Civil Defense Report in Rio de Janeiro**

The process for obtaining a duplicate copy of a report from Rio de Janeiro's Civil Defense involves requesting an "Emissão de Cópia Autêntica" (Issuance of Authentic Copy) of a Civil Defense inspection. It [1] is important to note that this service provides a document describing the visual technical analysis performed by an engineer or architect during an inspection, and it is distinct from a technical report that investigates causes and solutions.

 [1]**How to Request a Copy:**

The request can be made through several channels:
*   **Portal Carioca Digital:** By filling out a form available on the Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro's website. Users can find the form by searching for "Cópia Autêntica" or by accessing the direct link: https://carioca.rio/servicos/emissao-de-copia-autentica-vistoria-da-defesa-civil/.
*   [1] **Portal 1746.rio:** The service can also be requested via the 1746.rio portal.
*   [1] **Central 1746:** By contacting the Central 1746 by phone for guidance on the procedure. The [1] number for the municipality of Rio de Janeiro is 1746, and for other locations, it is (21) 3460-1746.
*   [2] **Civil Defense Headquarters:** By visiting the Civil Defense headquarters to receive guidance on how to proceed.

**Important [1] Considerations:**

*   A prior inspection by the Civil Defense must have taken place to request a copy. It is [2] not possible to request a copy at the same time a request for an inspection is opened.
*   [1] The request must be made through an electronic form, and only one authentic copy can be requested at a time.
*   [2] There is no charge for issuing the document.
*   [2] The expected timeframe for receiving the copy is up to 3 business days from the date of the request made through Central 1746.
*   [1] The copy will not be sent via email. Instead, a link will be provided in the "Área de Solicitações" (Requests Area) of the Carioca Digital portal, where it can be viewed and/or printed.
*   To [2] use the service, citizens must be correctly registered on the Portal Carioca Digital.

**Information [2] Required for the Request:**

When filling out the request form, certain information is mandatory (*). This includes:
*   The Protocol Number registered via Central 1746; OR
*   The Boletim de Ocorrência (BO) number generated for the inspection request; OR
*   The address of the occurrence (logradouro).

After completing [1] the request, a Protocol Number RIO will be generated, which can be tracked in the "Área de Solicitações" of the Portal Carioca Digital.

For any further [1] doubts regarding the completion of the request form, citizens can register a request via Central 1746 to the Ombudsman's office.

**Date of [1] Search:** August 8, 2025

**Sources:**
 - [1] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/emissao-de-copia-autentica-vistoria-da-defesa-civil/)

task_data.prompt: apareceram umas rachaduras estranhas na parede de casa, elas tão aumentando. isso é perigoso? devo chamar a defesa civil?
task_data.golden_answer:
Rachaduras que aumentam podem indicar risco estrutural. A Defesa Civil orienta que o morador **não hesite** em acionar o órgão sempre que notar trincas novas ou em crescimento.
 
 * Se perceber estalos, deformação ou o aumento rápido das fissuras, saia do cômodo e ligue *199* (Defesa Civil) ou *1746* – atendimento 24 h.
 * Para uma vistoria preventiva gratuita, solicite o serviço *Vistoria em edificação com rachaduras* pelo portal 1746: https://carioca.rio/servicos/vistoria-em-edificacao-apresentando-diversas-formas-de-rachadura-ou-infiltracao/ (tenha endereço e telefone em mãos).
 * Evite reformas ou quebrar a parede antes da avaliação técnica.

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** Friday, August 8, 2025 at 10:02 PM UTC

**Research Topic:** Defesa Civil Rio de Janeiro rachaduras vistoria (Civil Defense Rio de Janeiro crack inspection)

The Subsecretaria de Defesa Civil (Civil Defense Undersecretariat) in Rio de Janeiro conducts inspections of properties exhibiting cracks and other structural issues. These inspections are categorized as either preventive or emergency [1]. In January 2023, the Civil Defense responded to 1,423 inspections, with 81% being preventive and 19% emergency. Among these, 483 were for properties with cracks and infiltration, 375 for locations with threatened structural collapse, and 228 for actual structural collapses [1].

The Civil Defense's role in crack inspections is primarily a visual technical analysis to identify potential risks to people and property [2]. If a property only shows signs of infiltration without cracks, the Civil Defense does not intervene, as their scope is limited to visual assessment and does not include identifying the root cause of such issues. In such cases, it is the citizen's responsibility to hire a qualified professional for a technical report [2].

When cracks are observed, citizens are urged to contact the Civil Defense immediately via phone numbers 1746 or 199, which operate 24 hours a day [1]. The response time for these inspections varies: emergency cases are typically attended within 24 hours (often reduced to 10 hours), while preventive inspections have a maximum timeframe of 15 calendar days (often reduced to 7 days) [2].

The outcomes of these inspections are documented in a "Boletim de Ocorrência" (Occurrence Report) prepared by the inspecting engineer or architect. This report details the findings and any necessary actions, such as interdictions, isolations, shoring, or demolitions. Citizens can request a copy of this report through the 1746 Central de Atendimento. [2]

The Civil Defense also emphasizes the importance of citizens not undertaking unauthorized construction additions without proper licensing and technical supervision from a qualified engineer or architect, as these are considered irregular constructions. [1]

In terms of broader procedures, the Rio de Janeiro City Hall mandates periodic technical inspections for all properties, with a maximum interval of five years. These inspections are to verify the condition, stability, and safety of buildings and ensure necessary repairs are made. These technical inspections must be carried out by licensed engineers, architects, or companies, who then prepare a technical report. Property owners are required to report the results of these inspections to the City Hall. [3]

The Civil Defense also issues alerts for severe weather conditions, such as storms and strong winds, advising the public to stay informed, avoid unnecessary travel, and seek safe shelter. [2] In areas prone to landslides or flooding, residents are advised to monitor for signs of danger, such as ground cracks or leaning trees, and to contact the Civil Defense immediately if any risks are observed. [2]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/defesa-civil/defesa-civil-realiza-mais-de-mil-vistorias-so-no-mes-de-janeiro/)

 - [3] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/sections/10421452423451-Estrutura-de-Im%C3%B3vel)

task_data.prompt: a defesa civil faz treinamento com os moradores em area de risco? queria organizar um aqui na minha comunidade pra gente saber o que fazer se tiver sirene.
task_data.golden_answer:
Sim. A Defesa Civil Municipal cria *Núcleos de Proteção e Defesa Civil (NUPDEC)* em comunidades de risco e realiza cursos (≈3-4 semanas) que ensinam: alerta de sirenes, rotas de fuga, prevenção a incêndio e suporte básico de vida.
 
 *Como pedir:*
 
 1. E-mail para *defesacivil@rio.rj.gov.br* com nome da comunidade e nº de interessados; ou
 2. Solicite no *1746* (serviço “NUPDEC”). A gerência regional agenda visita e define o treinamento.
 
 Mais detalhes: https://carioca.rio/servicos/projeto-nupdec-nucleo-de-protecao-e-defesa-civil/

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Sim, a *Defesa Civil* do Rio de Janeiro realiza *exercícios simulados de desocupação* para treinar moradores de áreas de risco. O objetivo é preparar a comunidade para evacuar de forma segura quando a sirene tocar.

O treinamento geralmente acontece em duas etapas:
1.  **Reunião Preparatória:** A Defesa Civil se reúne com os moradores para explicar como o simulado funcionará e qual é o plano de evacuação da área.
2.  **O Simulado:** Em uma data marcada, a sirene é acionada e os moradores devem seguir as rotas de fuga até os *pontos de apoio* definidos.

Para solicitar um treinamento para a sua comunidade, você pode entrar em contato com a Prefeitura através da *Central 1746*.

Você pode *ligar para o número 1746* ou abrir um chamado no site https://www.1746.rio. Peça para registrar o interesse da sua comunidade em participar de um simulado da Defesa Civil. ✅

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

**Research Topic:** Civil defense training for residents of risk areas in Rio de Janeiro.

The Civil Defense of Rio de Janeiro engages in various training and preparedness initiatives for residents in risk areas. These efforts aim to educate the population on safety, prevention, and response to natural disasters.

**Key Findings:**

*   **Community Training and Preparedness:** The Civil Defense Municipal (Subsecretaria de Proteção e Defesa Civil - SUBPDEC) actively trains community members, including residents, community agents, and health agents, to act as volunteers and to enhance preparedness within their communities. This [1] training covers essential topics such as basic fire prevention, safe handling of gas cylinders, correct use of electrical equipment, and basic life support. The [1] goal is to foster a culture of prevention and equip residents with the knowledge to act safely during emergencies.
 [1]*   **Núcleos Comunitários de Defesa Civil (NUDEC's):** The city has implemented NUDEC's in communities identified as high-risk. These units involve community leaders, such as presidents of residents' associations and community health agents, who receive training and are equipped with communication tools like mobile phones to receive alerts and communicate with the Civil Defense.
*  [2]  **Simulated Exercises:** Simulated evacuation exercises are conducted in communities located in high-risk areas for landslides and floods. These drills aim to reinforce evacuation protocols when sirens are activated, ensuring residents know how to proceed to designated support points during severe weather events.
*  [1]  **Educational Programs:** The Civil Defense also conducts programs like "Defesa Civil nas Escolas" (Civil Defense in Schools), which educates students on topics such as domestic accident prevention, environmental education, natural disasters, and first aid.
*  [2]  **Risk Mapping and Alert Systems:** The Civil Defense utilizes risk mapping to identify vulnerable communities and implements alert systems, including sirens and SMS messages, to warn residents of impending dangers. The [2] State Civil Defense (Sedec-RJ) has also mapped areas most susceptible to floods, providing data to support municipal planning and prevention strategies.
*  [2]  **Volunteer Programs:** The Civil Defense Municipal has a volunteer program that trains individuals to assist in disaster prevention and mitigation efforts. This training includes first aid and fire prevention, and is increasingly being offered through virtual platforms.
*  [3]  **Broader Training Initiatives:** Beyond community-specific training, the Civil Defense offers courses such as "Curso Básico de Percepção de Riscos em Estruturas Edificadas" (Basic Course on Risk Perception in Built Structures) for professionals within the national, state, or municipal civil defense systems. The State [3] Civil Defense (ESDEC) also lists open courses, including "Curso de Mapeamento Participativo de Rotas de Fuga Aplicados a Defesa Civil" (Participatory Mapping of Escape Routes Applied to Civil Defense) and "Curso de Manejo de Animais em Situação de Desastres" (Animal Management in Disaster Situations).

These initiatives [2] demonstrate a multi-faceted approach by the Rio de Janeiro Civil Defense to train and prepare residents of risk areas for potential natural disasters.

**Sources:**
 - [1] [prefeitura.rio](https://coordenacaogovernamental.prefeitura.rio/secretaria-de-coordenacao-governamental/prevencao-e-seguranca-novos-moradores-do-morar-carioca-do-aco-recebem-capacitacao-da-defesa-civil/)
 - [2] [defesacivil.rj.gov.br](https://defesacivil.rj.gov.br/index.php/cursos-da-esdec/cursos-abertos)
 - [3] [defesacivil.rj.gov.br](https://www.defesacivil.rj.gov.br/index.php/cursos-da-esdec/cursos-abertos/1035-curso-basico-de-percepcao-de-riscos-em-estruturas-edificadas)

task_data.prompt: o muro do meu vizinho ta caindo pro lado da minha casa. to com medo de desabar. como chamo a defesa civil pra vir olhar?
task_data.golden_answer:
*Emergência?* Ligue agora para *199 (Defesa Civil Municipal)* ou, se houver risco imediato, para *193 (Bombeiros).*
 Para solicitar vistoria:
 
 1. Ligue *199* (24 h) e informe endereço, contato e situação.
 2. Online: acesse *https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10421712339867-Vistoria-em-desabamento-de-estrutura* e abra um protocolo.
  A Defesa Civil enviará equipe para avaliar e, se preciso, interditar a área.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para solicitar uma vistoria da Defesa Civil devido ao risco de queda do muro, você deve agir imediatamente.

Os canais oficiais para acionar a Defesa Civil no Rio de Janeiro são:

- **Emergência (risco iminente):** Ligue para o número **199**.
- **Solicitação de Vistoria:** Ligue para a Central de Atendimento da Prefeitura no número **1746**.

Ao ligar, tenha em mãos o *endereço completo do local de risco*, incluindo um ponto de referência, para que a equipe chegue o mais rápido possível.

Por segurança, recomendo que você e sua família evitem permanecer perto da área de risco até que um profissional qualificado avalie a situação. ⚠️

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

**Research Topic:** Chamar Defesa Civil Rio de Janeiro Risco de Desabamento (Calling Civil Defense Rio de Janeiro for Risk of Collapse)

To contact the Civil Defense of Rio de Janeiro in cases of risk of collapse or other emergencies, citizens can utilize several channels. The primary emergency number in Brazil, which also connects to the Fire Department and can provide assistance from the Civil Defense, is **193** [1]. Additionally, the Civil Defense of Rio de Janeiro can be reached through the municipal service center by dialing **1746** or **(21) 3460-1746** [2]. These numbers are subject to standard call charges [2].

The Subsecretaria de Proteção e Defesa Civil (SUBPDEC) is the municipal body responsible for preparing citizens for a safer life in Rio de Janeiro and addresses situations of risk. For [3] specific inquiries or to report issues related to building safety and potential collapse, the SUBPDEC has an office located at Rua Visconde de Santa Isabel, 32, Vila Isabel, Rio de Janeiro/RJ, CEP: 20560-120. Their [3] general telephone number is 2258-8868. The [3] Ouvidoria (Ombudsman) for the Civil Defense can be reached at (21) 4502-8829 or via 1746, and by email at ouvidoria_defesacivil@rio.rj.gov.br.
 [3]
The Portal Carioca Digital, which consolidates city services, lists "Defesa Civil" as a service category, allowing citizens to request actions such as "Solicitar vistoria" (Request inspection) or "Verificar se há algum risco no local" (Check if there is any risk at the location). For [2] official information and alerts, citizens can also register for SMS notifications about risks of disasters, including landslides and floods, by sending their CEP (postal code) to 40199.

In [4] situations involving structural risk, such as the threat or detachment of external elements of a building (e.g., eaves, windows, plaster), the Civil Defense can be engaged for inspections. An [2] "Auto de Interdição" (Interdiction Order) is a document issued by the Civil Defense after an inspection or upon request from other city bodies, serving as a preventive measure for locations with any level of risk. To obtain [1] information about an interdiction order for a property, one can visit the Civil Defense headquarters at Rua Visconde de Santa Isabel nº 32, Vila Isabel, with service hours from Monday to Friday, 9 am to 5 pm.

It is [1] important to note that while the SAMU (192) is the primary emergency medical service, it has experienced temporary outages in Rio de Janeiro. Therefore [2], for general emergencies and situations involving structural risks, the numbers 193 (Fire Department/general emergency) and 1746 (Civil Defense municipal service) are the recommended points of contact. [1]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [defesacivil.rj.gov.br](https://www.defesacivil.rj.gov.br/index.php/2-uncategorised/765-como-acionar-a-defesa-civil-do-rio-de-janeiro)
 - [2] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/grupo/defesa-civil/)

 - [4] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/informacoes-sobre-as-mensagens-de-alerta-da-defesa-civil/)

task_data.prompt: to querendo adotar um cachorrinho. onde eu posso ver os animais que a prefeitura tem pra adoção?
task_data.golden_answer:
Quer ver os bichinhos da Prefeitura?
 
 * *Online*: fotos no Instagram da SMPDA: https://www.instagram.com/subemprefeitura/
 * *Site*: lista e formulário na página *Campanha Adote um Amigo*: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10241841099547-Campanha-Adote-um-Amigo-Adoção-de-animais-sob-a-tutela-da-Secretaria-Municipal-de-Proteção-e-Defesa-dos-Animais
 * *Visita*: Fazenda Modelo (Guaratiba) ou unidades Jorge Vaitsman (São Cristóvão) e CCZ Paulo Dacorso (Santa Cruz).
 
 *Para adotar* leve Identidade, CPF e comprovante.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Que legal que você quer adotar um amigo de quatro patas! A Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro tem um programa lindo para isso. ❤️

Você pode conhecer os cães e gatos para adoção de algumas formas:

1.  ***Disque Adoção (WhatsApp)*:**
    É o jeito mais fácil de começar! Mande uma mensagem para o *WhatsApp* da Central 1746, no número **(21) 97732-6138**. Você receberá fotos e informações dos animais que esperam por um lar.

2.  ***Portal Carioca Digital*:**
    No site https://carioca.rio/servicos/adocao-de-animais/, você pode ver fotos e saber mais sobre os animais disponíveis.

Para adotar, você precisa:
- Ser maior de 18 anos.
- Apresentar identidade, CPF e comprovante de residência.
- Passar por uma entrevista e assinar um termo de posse responsável.

Todos os animais são vacinados, vermifugados e castrados (ou com castração garantida para filhotes).

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

**Research Topic:** Adotar cachorro prefeitura rio de janeiro

The Rio de Janeiro municipality facilitates dog adoption through various programs managed by its secretariats, primarily the Secretaria Municipal de Proteção e Defesa dos Animais (SMPDA) and the Instituto Municipal de Vigilância Sanitária, Vigilância de Zoonoses e de Inspeção Agropecuária (IVISA-RIO).

**Adoption [1] Channels and Programs:**

*   **Disque Adoção 1746:** This service, accessible through the central 1746, connects potential adopters with dogs and cats available at the Fazenda Modelo, the municipal public shelter. Interested individuals can receive photos and information about available animals by contacting the service via phone or WhatsApp at (21) 3460-1746. A preliminary application form is used to ensure responsible adoption.
*   **Fazenda [1] Modelo (Municipal Shelter):** Located at Estrada do Mato Alto, 5.620, Guaratiba, the Fazenda Modelo serves as the main facility for the SMPDA. It houses animals rescued from situations of abandonment and mistreatment, providing them with veterinary care before they are made available for adoption. The shelter operates Monday to Friday from 8 AM to 5 PM, and Saturdays from 8 AM to 12 PM.
*   **IVISA [2]-RIO Units:** IVISA-RIO manages veterinary units where dogs and cats are available for adoption. These include the Centro de Controle de Zoonoses Paulo Dacorso Filho (CCZ) in Santa Cruz and the Hospital Municipal Veterinário Jorge Vaitsman in Mangueira. Animals from these units are typically microchipped, vaccinated, and sterilized.
*   **"Adote [3] um Amigo" Campaign:** This initiative by the SMPDA aims to promote responsible pet adoption through various activities, including adoption events and online services.
*   **Online [1] Adoption Services:** The Prefeitura offers online adoption services via the website www.rio.rj.gov.br/defesa_animais, allowing potential adopters to view animal profiles and access relevant information.

**Adoption [2] Process and Requirements:**

Prospective dog adopters must meet specific criteria and follow a defined process:

*   **Age Requirement:** Adopters must be at least 18 years old.
*   **Documentation [3]:** Essential documents typically include a valid photo identification (e.g., RG), CPF, and proof of residence. Some programs [3] may also request photos and videos of the prospective home environment.
*   **Application [4] and Interview:** Applicants are generally required to complete a questionnaire and undergo an interview to assess their suitability and commitment to responsible pet ownership. In some instances, a technical inspection of the potential adopter's home may be conducted.
*   **Animal [1] Condition:** Animals are usually provided already sterilized (castrated), vaccinated, and microchipped. For animals younger than four months, sterilization may need to be scheduled separately.
*   **Responsible [1] Adoption Commitment:** Adopters must sign a Termo de Posse Responsável, signifying their commitment to providing proper care and ensuring the animal's well-being, thereby preventing abandonment or mistreatment.

**Contact [1] Information:**

*   **Central 1746:** For inquiries and the "Disque Adoção" service. WhatsApp: (21) 3460-1746.
*   **Fazenda [1] Modelo:** For adoption inquiries, contact via WhatsApp: (21) 97732-6138.
*   **Centro [4] de Controle de Zoonoses Paulo Dacorso Filho (CCZ):** Located at Largo do Bodegão, 150, Santa Cruz. Phone: 3395-4709.
*   **Hospital [3] Municipal Veterinário Jorge Vaitsman:** Located at Avenida Bartolomeu de Gusmão, 1.120, Mangueira.

The SMPDA is the [3] municipal body responsible for establishing and implementing animal protection policies within Rio de Janeiro, which includes the rescue, care, and promotion of responsible adoption of animals. [5]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/protecao-defesa-animais/central-1746-agora-tem-disque-adocao-servico-que-aproxima-caes-e-gatos-de-seus-futuros-tutores/)
 - [2] [rio.rj.gov.br](http://www0.rio.rj.gov.br/pcrj/destaques/defesa_animais.htm)
 - [3] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/adocao-de-animais/)
 - [4] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10241841099547-Campanha-Adote-um-Amigo-Ado%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-animais-sob-a-tutela-da-Secretaria-Municipal-de-Prote%C3%A7%C3%A3o-e-Defesa-dos-Animais)
 - [5] [prefeitura.rio](https://protecaoanimal.prefeitura.rio/)

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! A campanha anual de vacinação antirrábica da Prefeitura geralmente acontece no segundo semestre.

Mas você não precisa esperar! A vacinação para cães e gatos é *gratuita* e está disponível durante todo o ano em postos permanentes. 🐾

*Regras para vacinação:*
- Cães devem usar coleira e guia.
- Gatos devem ser levados em caixas de transporte.
- Animais agressivos precisam de focinheira.
- É necessário que o animal esteja saudável e tenha mais de 3 meses.

Os dois principais locais são o *Hospital Municipal Veterinário Jorge Vaitsman* e o *Centro de Controle de Zoonoses Paulo Dacorso Filho*.

Para te ajudar, **posso buscar o endereço certinho desses postos para você?**

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Rabies Vaccination Campaign for Dogs and Cats in Rio de Janeiro**

The annual rabies vaccination campaign for dogs and cats in Rio de Janeiro is a crucial public health initiative organized by the Municipal Health Secretariat, primarily through the Municipal Institute of Health Surveillance, Zoonoses Surveillance, and Agricultural Inspection (IVISA-Rio) [1]. The campaign typically commences in August and extends through November, employing a phased approach with vaccination events held on Saturdays across different neighborhoods to ensure city-wide coverage [1].

For the year 2024, the campaign was structured into five stages, with specific dates in October and November targeting various zones within the city [1]. For instance, the fourth stage occurred on October 26, 2024, and the fifth stage was scheduled for November 9, 2024, both focusing on the West Zone of Rio de Janeiro [1]. Looking ahead, the 2025 campaign was planned to take place in the second semester, with preparations including the opening of registrations for volunteer vaccinators in May and extending into June [2].

During the campaign, vaccination posts operate from 9 AM to 5 PM [1]. The vaccination is free of charge [3]. Eligible animals include healthy dogs and cats that are at least three months old, or those whose annual vaccination cycle has expired [1]. Specific guidelines are in place for animal handling: dogs must be on a leash and collar, cats should be in carriers or cloth bags, and aggressive animals require a muzzle [3]. It is important to note that only animals brought to the designated vaccination posts will receive the vaccine; citizens are prohibited from taking vaccine vials home [3]. Minor side effects such as localized soreness, fever, or a quieter demeanor may occur in animals for up to 36 hours post-vaccination [3]. All vaccination sites are supervised by veterinarians to ensure the safety and efficacy of the process [1].

Beyond the annual campaign, residents can also vaccinate their pets year-round at IVISA-Rio's permanent veterinary service units. These include the Municipal Veterinary Hospital Jorge Vaitsman and the Paulo Dacorso Filho Zoonoses Control Center (CCZ) [2]. The Secretariat of Animal Protection and Defense (SMPDA) is also involved in animal welfare and may provide relevant information [2]. For general inquiries, services, or to report issues, the public can contact the 1746 service [2].

Rabies is a serious zoonotic disease transmitted through the saliva of infected animals, typically via bites or scratches, and it affects the central nervous system [4]. While the virus remains a concern, Rio de Janeiro has maintained a strong record in controlling rabies. There have been no reported cases of rabies in domestic animals in the municipality since 1995, and no human cases have been recorded since 1986 [1]. Nevertheless, the virus continues to circulate in wild animal populations, particularly bats, highlighting the ongoing importance of vaccination as the primary method of prevention and control [1].

The current date is August 8, 2025.

task_data.prompt: quero castrar minha gata de graça. como eu faço pra marcar pelo site da prefeitura?
task_data.golden_answer:
Para castrar sua gata sem custo:
 
 1. *Cadastro*: crie conta em https://minhasaude.rio e registre a gata em *Meus Pets*.
 2. *Agendamento*: acesse https://www.carioca.rio › *Solicitações à Vigilância Sanitária* › *Castração de cães e gatos* › *Quero Agendar*. Escolha unidade (Hospital Jorge Vaitsman – Mangueira ou CCZ – Santa Cruz), data e horário. Confirme; você receberá e-mail.
 3. *Regras*: animal saudável, ≥ 5 meses, jejum 12 h; até 3 castrações/CPF/mês. Para gatas o hemograma é opcional.
 
 Mais detalhes: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/9894347087899-Castração-de-cães-e-gatos-agendamento-on-line

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para agendar a castração gratuita da sua gata no Rio de Janeiro, você deve utilizar o portal do *Programa Bicho Rio*, da Prefeitura.

O agendamento é feito online. Acesse o site oficial do serviço para realizar o cadastro e marcar o procedimento:
https://carioca.rio/servicos/smpda-programa-bicho-rio-esterilizacao-gratuita-de-caes-e-gatos/

*Requisitos para a cirurgia:*
- A gata deve ter entre 4 meses e 6 anos.
- Peso mínimo de 1,5 kg.
- Estar saudável (não pode estar no cio, prenha ou amamentando).
- É necessário jejum de 12 horas (água e comida) antes.

*Documentos necessários (original e cópia):*
- Sua identidade e CPF.
- Comprovante de residência no município do Rio em seu nome.

O agendamento é online, mas o procedimento é feito em postos de atendimento. Você gostaria que eu buscasse os endereços para você?

tool_return.text:
## Research Artifact: Scheduling Free Cat Neutering in Rio de Janeiro

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

The municipal government of Rio de Janeiro, through the Secretaria Municipal de Proteção e Defesa dos Animais (SMPDA), offers a free sterilization program for dogs and cats known as "Programa Bicho Rio". This [1] initiative aims to control the animal population within the city and is available to residents of the Municipality of Rio de Janeiro.
 [2]
### Scheduling Procedures

There are several methods for scheduling the free neutering service:

*   **Online:** While the "Sistema de Atendimento de Animais" (SAA) website was previously indicated for scheduling, it was reported as unavailable due to a hacker attack on the Prefeitura do Rio's datacenter. However [2], more recent information suggests that scheduling can be done "pelo site". An online portal with login fields is also available for scheduling, specifically for animals aged 5 months and older.
*   **Phone:** The number 1746 was also provided for scheduling, but this service was also reported as unavailable due to the aforementioned hacker attack.
 [2]*   **In-Person:** Tutors can also schedule appointments by visiting designated Veterinary Care Units on specific dates. These dates are published in the annual castration calendar, which is updated periodically.
 [2]
### Requirements for Surgery

To be eligible for the free sterilization surgery, animals must meet the following criteria:

*   **Age:** Animals should generally be between 4 months and 6 years old. Some [1] sources specify a minimum age of 5 months or between 6 months and 7 years after tooth change.
*   **Weight:** For cats, a minimum weight of 1.5kg is required. For dogs, the weight range is typically between 3.5kg and 25kg, with one source mentioning a maximum of 20kg.
 [1]*   **Health Status:** The animal must not be in heat, pregnant, or nursing. Animals [1] must be healthy at the time of the pre-operative evaluation. If an animal exhibits signs of infectious, parasitic, systemic disease, or any other condition that compromises its general state, the surgery will not be performed, and the animal will be referred to clinical medicine.
*   **Fasting:** A fasting period of 12 hours is required before the procedure, with no food or water. Another [1] guideline specifies 8 hours without food and water.
*   **Blood Test:** For dogs and female dogs, a hemogram performed within the last 30 days is mandatory.

### Required Documentation

When attending the appointment, the animal's tutor must present the following documents in original and copy:

*   Identification (ID and CPF)
* [1]   Proof of residence in Rio de Janeiro in the owner's name

 [1]### Special Considerations for Braquicephalic Breeds

Animals with braquicephalic (short-snouted) features, such as Pugs, Shih Tzus, and Bulldogs, or those with a purple tongue, have specific scheduling requirements due to anesthetic safety concerns. These animals must be scheduled for sterilization at municipal veterinary hospitals. The "MinhaSaúde.Rio" app is designated for scheduling these particular cases.

 [1]### Additional Information

*   Only one animal can be neutered per appointment.
* [1]   For cancellations, a contact number via WhatsApp is available: (21) 97733-0193.

**Sources:**
 - [1] [google.com](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=br.gov.rio.minhasaude&hl=de)
 - [2] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/smpda-programa-bicho-rio-esterilizacao-gratuita-de-caes-e-gatos/)

task_data.prompt: meu vizinho deixa o cachorro o dia todo amarrado no sol, sem agua. isso é maus tratos né? como eu denuncio? pode ser anônimo?
task_data.golden_answer:
Sim, manter o cachorro preso ao sol sem água caracteriza maus-tratos a animais.
 
 *Como denunciar*
 
 * Portal 1746 → *“Vistoria técnica em situações de maus-tratos de animais domésticos”*: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10242348321307-Vistoria-t%C3%A9cnica-em-situa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-de-maus-tratos-de-animais-dom%C3%A9sticos
 * Telefone *1746* (ou (21) 3460-1746 fora do Rio)
 * Aplicativo 1746
 
 *Pode ser anônimo?*
 Sim. O formulário oferece a opção *“Solicitar Anonimamente”*.
 
 *Informações necessárias*
 
 * Endereço completo e pontos de referência
 * Descrição (frequência, fotos/vídeos, se tiver)
 * Tipo de animal e, se souber, dados do tutor
 
 Prazo estimado: vistoria em até 7 dias úteis.
 
 Violência grave ou envenenamento? Registre também na DPMA (21 2253-1177) ou chame a Polícia 190.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Sim, manter um animal amarrado ao sol e sem água é crime de maus-tratos. Você pode e deve denunciar, e a sua denúncia pode ser **totalmente anônima**.

Os canais oficiais para fazer a denúncia no Rio de Janeiro são:

1.  **Central 1746 (Prefeitura):**
    - Telefone: Ligue **1746** ou (21) 3460-1746.
    - Online: Pelo portal www.1746.rio ou pelo aplicativo *1746*.

2.  **Disque Denúncia (Linha Verde):**
    - Especializado em denúncias anônimas.
    - Telefone: (21) 2253-1177.

*Informações importantes para a denúncia:*
Ao registrar, forneça o endereço completo da ocorrência e descreva a situação com o máximo de detalhes possível para ajudar na fiscalização.

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

**Research Topic:** Can reports of animal cruelty in Rio de Janeiro be made anonymously?

It is possible to report animal cruelty anonymously in Rio de Janeiro. The "Linha Verde" program, operated by Disque Denúncia, accepts anonymous reports via telephone and through its application. [1] Specifically, the Disque Denúncia RJ program can be contacted via phone at (21) 2253-1177 or 0300 253 1177, and also through their app or website. The [1] "Linha Verde" program utilizes a "WhatsApp anonimizado" technique, which removes or modifies identifying information from reports.
 [1]
The Municipal Secretariat for Animal Protection and Defense (SMPDA) of the Rio de Janeiro City Hall also provides channels for reporting animal mistreatment. These can be accessed through the Central de Atendimento 1746, via phone at 1746 or (21) 3460-1746, through the 1746 website (www.1746.rio), or via the 1746 mobile app. While [2] the 1746 portal is mentioned for various animal-related services, including reporting mistreatment, the specific detail about anonymity for these channels is not explicitly stated in the provided search results, though the Disque Denúncia program is confirmed to be anonymous.

For [2] situations involving direct violence, poisoning, or abandonment, reporting to the police at the nearest station or the Delegacia de Proteção ao Meio Ambiente (DPMA) is also an option. The [2] general numbers for the Civil Police are 197 and for the Military Police are 190. The [2] Polícia Civil RJ also has a Delegacia de Proteção ao Meio Ambiente (DPMA) with contact numbers (21) 3399-3290 or (21) 3399-3298.

The Disque [2] Denúncia RJ program has reported a significant number of animal cruelty complaints, with over half of the environmental crime reports received in the current year pertaining to animal mistreatment. The program [1] notes that dogs, cats, and horses are the most frequently reported victims of cruelty. [1]

*Registro Geral de Animais (RGA)* – identidade obrigatória para cães/gatos no Rio:
 
 1. Vá a uma unidade IVISA-Rio para chipagem *gratuita* (sem agendar):
 
 * Jorge Vaitsman – Av. Bart. de Gusmão, 1120, Mangueira
 * CCZ – Largo do Bodegão, 150, Santa Cruz
 
 2. Chip aplicado, dados entram no *Sisbicho* e a carteira digital chega por e-mail.
 
 3. Clínicas credenciadas também podem emitir (pode haver taxa).
 
 Mais info: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10769915710363-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-sobre-o-Sisbicho-Cadastro-de-animais

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! O Registro Geral de Animais (RGA) do seu cachorro é uma identidade digital gratuita, feita através da plataforma *SISBICHO*. O processo principal é a *microchipagem* do seu pet.

Para fazer, basta levar seu animal a um dos locais abaixo para a *microchipagem gratuita*. Após o procedimento, a carteirinha digital do RGA é enviada para o seu e-mail.

*Onde fazer:*
- **Hospital Veterinário Jorge Vaitsman**: Av. Bartolomeu de Gusmão, 1.120, Mangueira. (Diariamente, 8h às 22h).
- **Centro de Zoonoses Paulo Dacorso Filho**: Largo do Bodegão, 150, Santa Cruz. (Segunda a sexta, 8h às 17h).

*Requisitos:*
- O tutor deve ser maior de idade e apresentar um documento de identificação.
- Cães de raças como pitbull, fila e rottweiler precisam usar focinheira.

Para mais informações ou em caso de problemas, contate: *sisbicho.ivisa@prefeitura.rio*. 🐶

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Como Fazer RGA para Cachorro no Rio de Janeiro**

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

The Registro Geral de Animais (RGA) in Rio de Janeiro functions as a digital identity card for dogs and cats, utilizing a microchip implanted under the animal's skin. This system is managed through the digital platform SISBICHO, developed by IplanRio, an entity linked to the Casa Civil [1]. The microchipping and registration process is provided free of charge for dogs and cats [2].

**Procedure for Obtaining the RGA:**

1.  **Microchipping:** The fundamental step in obtaining the RGA is the microchipping of the animal. This involves implanting a microchip, approximately the size of a grain of rice, beneath the pet's skin [1].
2.  **Service Locations:**
    *   **IVISA-Rio Units:** Microchipping services are available at the veterinary care facilities of the Instituto Municipal de Vigilância Sanitária (IVISA-Rio). These [1] include:
        *   Hospital Municipal Veterinário Jorge Vaitsman, located at Av. Bartolomeu de Gusmão, 1.120, Mangueira. This unit operates daily from 8 AM to 10 PM.
   [1]      *   Centro de Controle de Zoonoses Paulo Dacorso Filho (CCZ), situated at Largo do Bodegão, 150, Santa Cruz. This facility is open from Monday to Friday, 8 AM to 5 PM.
    [1] *   **Itinerant Actions:** The service is also offered during mobile events organized by the Municipal Health Secretariat across various city locations.
3.  [1] **Data Registration:** Following the microchipping, the animal's data is entered into the SISBICHO platform.
4.  [1] **RGA Issuance:** The SISBICHO system then generates a digital proof of the RGA, presented as a stamped and numbered card, which is subsequently emailed to the pet's owner.

**Important [1] Information for Pet Owners:**

*   **Tutor Requirements:** The pet owner must be of legal age and present with a valid identification document.
*   [1] **Animal Containment:** The owner is responsible for safely restraining the animal during the procedure.
*   [1] **Aggressive Breeds:** As per Law nº 4.597/05, dogs identified as pitbull, fila, doberman, or rottweiler, or those exhibiting aggressive temperaments, must be muzzled during the procedure. For cats [1], the use of a leash is recommended when feasible.
*    [1]**Existing Microchips:** If the animal already has a microchip, it can be utilized for the registration process.
*    [2]**Support and Inquiries:** For any issues related to receiving the pet's RGA card or for general inquiries about the registration, owners can contact sisbicho.ivisa@prefeitura.rio. When contacting, it is necessary to provide the date and location of the itinerant action attended, the owner's full name, CPF, and registered email address.

**Purpose [1] of the RGA:**

The RGA serves as a crucial identification tool for pets, aiding in their recovery if they become lost. It also [1] contributes to the municipal census of dogs and cats, supporting the development of public policies related to animal welfare and public health, including the control of zoonotic diseases. Furthermore [3], the RGA is recognized as a measure to combat animal abandonment.

**Legal [2] Mandate:**

The mandatory nature of the RGA in Rio de Janeiro has been formalized through a decree issued by the city's government.

**Accreditation [3] for Service Providers:**

Veterinary establishments and independent professionals involved in animal registration and microchipping are required to obtain accreditation from Ivisa-Rio and ensure that all microchipped animals are registered within the Sisbicho platform. [3]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [prefeitura.rio](https://vigilanciasanitaria.prefeitura.rio/sisbicho/)
 - [2] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/plataforma-do-registro-geral-de-animais-sisbicho/)
 - [3] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/vigilancia-sanitaria/carteira-de-identidade-digital-para-caes-e-gatos-cariocas-e-regulamentada-na-cidade-do-rio/)

To complain about a high water bill from Águas do Rio, customers have several channels available for administrative and, if necessary, judicial recourse. It is recommended to exhaust administrative avenues before pursuing legal action.

 [1]**Channels for Complaint:**

*   **Customer Service (SAC):** Águas do Rio offers 24-hour customer service, seven days a week, through various channels.
   [2]  *   **WhatsApp:** 0800 195 0 195.
   [2]  *   **Telephone:** 0800 195 0 195.

*  [2]  **Ouvidoria (Ombudsman):** For issues not resolved through the primary customer service channels, the Ouvidoria can be contacted.
   [2]  *   **Telephone:** 0800 195 0 200. The [2] operating hours are Monday to Friday, from 8 AM to 6 PM.
   [2]  *   The Ouvidoria serves as a final instance for internal problem-solving within the company.
*  [3]  **Physical Service Locations:** Águas do Rio has service locations across various municipalities in Rio de Janeiro.
*   [2] **Online Channels:** While not explicitly detailed for high bill complaints, the company generally offers online services for account management.

**Grounds [1] for Contesting a Bill:**

A water bill may be considered undue if:
*   It does not correspond to services actually provided or requested by the consumer. This [3] includes charges for water not consumed, debts from previous residents, or charges applied without proper justification.
*   [3] It violates legal norms, such as the application of fines or penalties without due process or the right to defense.
*   [3] It is based on estimated consumption or averages when the consumer has a functioning water meter, or when a minimum tariff should be applied if no meter is present.

**Legal [3] Recourse:**

If administrative channels fail to resolve the issue, consumers may consider legal action. It is advisable to gather all relevant documentation, including:
*   Personal identification (RG, CPF) and proof of residence.
*   [1] Previous water bills to establish a consumption history.
*   [1] Evidence of the problem, such as photos or videos of incorrect readings or meter issues.
*   [1] Protocols from previous complaints made to Águas do Rio and consumer protection agencies like Procon.
*   Receipts [1] for any additional expenses incurred due to the incorrect billing, such as purchasing bottled water.

It is [1] important to note that charging for services after the water supply has been cut off is considered illegal. Consumers [1] have the right to contest such charges, and in cases of undue payments, a refund in double the amount paid may be applicable.

**Note [1]:** Some sources mention a different telephone number for the Águas do Rio Ouvidoria (127 or 21-3883-4600) and a physical address in Centro, Rio de Janeiro. However [1], the primary contact information provided directly by Águas do Rio lists 0800 195 0 200 for their Ouvidoria. [2]

task_data.prompt: acho que meu vizinho fez um gato de agua, a conta dele nunca vem e a minha só aumenta. como eu denuncio isso?
task_data.golden_answer:
Para denunciar “gato” de água:
 
 1. Verifique qual concessionária atende seu bairro (a maior parte da cidade é servida pela Águas do Rio; alguns trechos ainda permanecem com a CEDAE).
 
 2. Com endereço completo e ponto de referência, escolha um canal:
 
 * *Águas do Rio* – 24 h: telefone/WhatsApp *0800 195 0 195* ou formulário: https://aguasdorio.com.br/contato/
 * *CEDAE* (bairros remanescentes): *0800 282 1195* ou site: https://www.cedae.com.br
 
 A denúncia é gratuita e pode ser anônima. O furto de água é crime (art. 155 do Código Penal). Se o “gato” estiver aumentando sua conta, solicite revisão à concessionária.

### Research Artifact: Reporting Water Theft in Rio de Janeiro

The process for reporting water theft in Rio de Janeiro involves contacting various municipal and state entities, depending on the nature of the irregularity.

For issues related to the irregular capture of water, such as unauthorized wells, the municipal environmental patrol can be requested. Citizens can initiate this by contacting the central service at **1746** [1]. The **Portal Carioca Digital** also serves as a platform for reporting such issues, specifically mentioning the denunciation of water capture and the opening of wells [1].

The **Disque Denúncia (Linha Verde)** program, which focuses on environmental crimes, accepts anonymous reports 24 hours a day regarding water-related issues, including clandestine water capture, irregular water trade, and water waste. [2] Information provided to Disque Denúncia is forwarded to the competent authorities. This [2] service can be accessed via phone at **0300 253 1177**, through their website (www.disquedenuncia.org.br), or via their Facebook page (www.facebook.com/linhaverdedd).
 [2]
The **CEDAE (Companhia Estadual de Águas e Esgotos)**, the state water and sewage company, can be contacted through its **Ouvidoria** (Ombudsman) for complaints and reports. The Ouvidoria can be reached by phone at **0800 031 6032** during business hours (8 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Friday) or in person at Avenida Presidente Vargas, n.º 2655 – 6º andar, Cidade Nova, Rio de Janeiro/RJ. CEDAE [2] also has a general customer service line at **0800 282 1195**, which operates 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

The concessionaire [3] **Águas do Rio** provides multiple channels for customer service and reporting. These include a 24/7 WhatsApp service at **0800 195 0 195**, a SAC (Serviço de Atendimento ao Consumidor) line at the same number, and an email address: atende.rj@aguasdorio.com.br. Their Ouvidoria [4] can be contacted at **0800 195 0 200**.

The **1746 [4]** service, managed by the Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro, is a central point for various citizen requests and complaints, including those related to environmental issues and water capture. The **Portal [1] Rio 1746** allows users to submit requests online, via a mobile app, or by phone.

For specific [3] areas managed by **Zona Oeste Mais Saneamento**, a confidential channel is available, including a 24-hour hotline at **0800 377 8006**.

The **Agenersa [5] (Agência Reguladora de Energia e Saneamento do Estado do Rio de Janeiro)** also provides contact information for reporting issues, including phone numbers **0800 024 9040** and **(21) 2332-6457** (WhatsApp), and email addresses ouvidoria@agenersa.rj.gov.br or ouvidoria.agenersa@gmail.com.

It is important [2] to note that when reporting issues through the 1746 service, citizens can select "Meio Ambiente" as a category and then specify the type of denunciation, such as "Denunciar captação de água".

Date of Search [1]: August 8, 2025

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

**Summary of Findings:**

To report issues regarding water quality in Rio de Janeiro, citizens have several channels available, primarily through municipal and state services. The primary platform for citizen services in Rio de Janeiro is the "Portal 1746" (www.1746.rio), which can be accessed via its website, a smartphone application, or by calling the central number 1746. This portal serves as a unified channel for various municipal services, including environmental complaints and service-related issues. [1]

For issues specifically related to water quality or pollution, the "Portal Carioca Digital" (part of the 1746 system) offers a service for reporting water pollution, which can be initiated through their website, app, or by phone. [1] This service is for investigating known causes of pollution, such as commercial or industrial discharges. The portal also clarifies which entity to contact based on the nature and location of the pollution, distinguishing between issues handled by the municipality, CEDAE, or other concessionaires. [1]

The Companhia Estadual de Águas e Esgotos (CEDAE) is a key entity involved in water supply and has its own channels for customer complaints and feedback. The CEDAE Ouvidoria (Ombudsman) can be contacted via phone at 0800 031 6032, in person at their headquarters, or through written correspondence. CEDAE [2] also provides information on water quality through their bills and website, and they have a dedicated phone line (0800-2821195) for water quality analysis requests.
 [2]
For broader consumer rights issues related to water services, the Procon Carioca is available. They have established a special channel for complaints concerning water and electricity services, aiming for swift resolution of problems.
 [2]
The Ministério Público do Estado do Rio de Janeiro (MPRJ) also accepts complaints regarding water supply issues through its Ouvidoria. Citizens can report problems via their website or by calling 127 or (21) 3883-4600.

The [1] concessionaire Águas do Rio also provides customer service through various channels, including a 24/7 hotline at 0800 195 0 195, a WhatsApp service at the same number, and physical service points across the state. Their [3] Ouvidoria can be reached at 0800 195 0 200.

For [1] specific issues concerning the Zona Oeste Mais Saneamento (formerly Foz Águas 5), complaints can be made through their dedicated channels, including a WhatsApp number (21) 99519-0005, a general phone line 0800 025 0005, and an Ouvidoria at 0800 771 0012.

The [4] Agência Reguladora de Energia e Saneamento Básico do Estado do Rio de Janeiro (Agenersa) also plays a role in regulating these services and can be contacted for issues related to water and sewage services, including through their Ouvidoria at 0800 024 9040 or via email at ouvidoria@agenersa.rj.gov.br.

When reporting [5] an issue, it is generally advised to provide complete contact information, the exact location of the problem, and a detailed description of the issue, including any relevant reference points or times of occurrence. [1]

tool_return.text:
### Research Artifact: Water Shortages in Rio de Janeiro

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

**Summary of Findings:**

Rio de Janeiro has been experiencing intermittent water supply issues affecting various parts of the city and surrounding municipalities. These disruptions are primarily attributed to emergency repairs on large-scale pipelines, maintenance work, and, in some instances, power outages affecting water treatment plants.

**Key Incidents and Causes:**

*   **August 2025:** Several incidents have been reported in early August 2025. On August 6th, Águas do Rio announced a temporary suspension of water distribution in the Grande Tijuca, parts of the Centro, Zona Norte, and Zona Sul of Rio de Janeiro due to a leak in a large-diameter pipeline in the Maracanã neighborhood. The [1] repair work was expected to be completed by August 7th, with gradual normalization of supply taking up to 72 hours or more. On [1] August 7th, a significant leak in a high-pressure pipeline in Campo Grande affected the water supply in several West Zone neighborhoods, including Campo Grande, Santíssimo, Senador Camará, Bangu, Realengo, Padre Miguel, Jabour, Jardim Sulacap, and Campos dos Afonsos. On [1] August 8th, Águas do Rio reported emergency repairs for leaks on Avenida Brasil in Bonsucesso, impacting parts of Bonsucesso and Complexo da Maré, with full restoration anticipated within 72 hours.
*    [2]**July 2025:** On July 11th, Águas do Rio announced a temporary water supply interruption for several central and southern neighborhoods, including Catete, Laranjeiras, Bairro de Fátima, Catumbi, Centro, Cidade Nova, Estácio, Lapa, and Praça da Bandeira, for the installation of an intelligent valve. Normalization [1] was expected to take up to 48 hours or more. In late July [1] (around July 29th), Águas do Rio also suspended water supply in Caonze, Nova Iguaçu, and Mesquita due to an emergency repair of a leak.
*   **Previous [3] Incidents (2024):** In December 2024, at least 11 neighborhoods in Rio de Janeiro experienced water supply problems following emergency repairs. The concessionaire Águas do Rio was notified by Procon due to the prolonged disruption, which had lasted for six days in some areas. This followed [4] a planned annual maintenance on the Guandu System, which supplies the city, leading to a temporary shutdown and subsequent issues with re-supply.
*   **Causes [4] of Disruption:** The primary causes for water shortages identified include:
    *   **Emergency Repairs:** Leaks in large-diameter or high-pressure pipelines requiring immediate attention.
    *   **Maintenance [1] Work:** Planned interventions on water systems, such as the Guandu System.
    *   **Power [4] Outages:** Failures in the electricity supply affecting water treatment plants (ETAs) and pumping stations. For example [5], a power failure impacted the ETA Campos Elíseos in Duque de Caxias, leading to reduced supply.
    *   **Infrastructure [2] Issues:** Underlying problems with infrastructure, such as aging pipelines, contribute to leaks and disruptions.
    *   **Environmental [1] Factors:** While not the primary cause of recent disruptions, broader issues like climate change, deforestation, precarious infrastructure, and pollution of water sources have been cited as contributing factors to water scarcity in the region over the longer term.

**Affected Areas [6]:**

The disruptions have affected a wide range of neighborhoods across Rio de Janeiro, including:
*   **Central and South Zones:** Catete, Laranjeiras, Bairro de Fátima, Catumbi, Centro, Cidade Nova, Estácio, Lapa, Praça da Bandeira, Botafogo, Cosme Velho, Flamengo, Leme, Santa Teresa, Urca.
*   **North Zone [1] and Grande Tijuca:** Andaraí, Engenho Novo, Lins de Vasconcelos, Maracanã, Méier, Praça da Bandeira, Riachuelo, Rio Comprido, Rocha, Sampaio, São Francisco Xavier, Tijuca, Vila Isabel.
*   **West Zone:** Campo [1] Grande, Santíssimo, Senador Camará, Bangu, Realengo, Padre Miguel, Jabour, Jardim Sulacap, Campos dos Afonsos.
*   **Complexo da Maré [1] and Bonsucesso**.
*   **Baixada Fluminense [2]:** Municipalities such as Nova Iguaçu and Mesquita have also experienced supply interruptions.

**Recommendations and Response [3]:**

Concessionaires like Águas do Rio and Cedae advise residents in affected areas to conserve water, use stored water from cisterns and water tanks for essential needs, and postpone non-urgent tasks requiring significant water consumption until supply is fully restored. They also provide contact [1] numbers for customer service and emergency assistance. The Procon has also been involved [5], notifying concessionaires about prolonged service interruptions.

**Broader Context:**

Concerns [4] about water quality, including issues with turbidity, odor, and taste, have also been raised in Rio de Janeiro since early 2020, attributed to substances like geosmin and potentially linked to inadequate sewage treatment and environmental factors. The privatization of Cedae [1] in 2021 has been a subject of debate, with critics arguing that it has not led to the promised universalization of basic sanitation and has resulted in service deterioration and increased tariffs. There are ongoing discussions [3] about the management and future of water services in the state, with a focus on public versus private models. [3]

**Sources:**

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

**Research Topic:** Reportar vazamento de água na calçada Rio de Janeiro

To report a water leak on a sidewalk in Rio de Janeiro, the primary and most comprehensive channel is the **1746** service. This [1] service acts as a central point for various municipal services and can be accessed through several methods:

*   **Telephone:** Dial 1746 or (21) 3460-1746. Note that calls to these numbers may incur charges equivalent to a landline call.
 [1]*   **Mobile Application:** The 1746 app is available for both Android and iOS devices.
 [1]*   **WhatsApp:** Reports can be submitted via WhatsApp to the number (21) 3460-1746.
 [1]*   **Online:** Through the Portal Carioca Digital or the official 1746 website (www.1746.rio).
 [1]
When making a report, it is essential to provide detailed information to facilitate the process. This includes the complete address of the leak, specifying the neighborhood, street name, nearest building number, and any significant points of reference. It [2] is also important to note if water is accumulating in the area of the leak, as this often indicates a problem with the public water network.
 [2]
The water supply and sewage systems in Rio de Janeiro are managed by concessionaire companies, primarily **CEDAE** (Companhia Estadual de Águas e Esgotos) and **Águas do Rio**.

* [1]   **CEDAE** can be contacted for water leaks through their virtual agency website (agenciavirtual.cedae.com.br), by email at ouvidoriageral@cedae.com.br, or by calling their call center at 0800-2821195 or their ombudsman at 0800-0316032.
*  [3]  **Águas do Rio** can be reached for leak reports via their mobile application (Águas App), their website (www.aguasdorio.com.br), or by phone and WhatsApp at 0800 195 0 195.

While [1] property owners are generally responsible for the maintenance of their sidewalks, leaks originating from the public water network are typically the responsibility of the respective water concessionaire. Therefore [2], reporting the leak through the appropriate channels ensures it is directed to the entity responsible for its repair. The Portal Carioca Digital is highlighted as a consolidating platform for all services offered by the Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro. [1]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [jlcacavazamentos.com.br](https://jlcacavazamentos.com.br/como-localizar-vazamento-na-rua-e-o-que-fazer)

task_data.prompt: minha conta de luz veio um absurdo esse mes! impossivel eu ter gasto isso tudo. como eu peço pra light revisar?
task_data.golden_answer:
Para pedir que a Light revise sua conta:
 
 * Acesse a *Agência Virtual* da Light (https://agenciavirtual.light.com.br/Portal/Acesso_Servicos.aspx) e escolha *Reclamação do valor da conta*.
 * Se preferir, envie “Revisão de fatura” para o WhatsApp oficial da Light *Lia* (21 99981-6059).
 * Também é possível ligar, 24 h, para o *0800 021 0196* ou usar o app *Light Clientes* (Android/iOS).
 * Anote o número de protocolo: pela Resolução Aneel 1000/2021 você pode contestar em até *30 dias* após receber a fatura, e a distribuidora tem até *15 dias* para responder.
 * Caso a resposta não resolva, registre reclamação na Aneel: telefone 167 ou https://www.aneel.gov.br.
 
 Guarde todos os comprovantes até o caso ser concluído. Boa sorte!

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Entendo sua surpresa com o valor da conta de luz. Você pode solicitar a revisão da sua fatura diretamente à Light por meio dos seguintes canais oficiais:

1.  ***WhatsApp***: Fale com a Lia, a assistente virtual da Light, pelo número *(21) 99981-6059*. É um dos canais mais diretos para solicitar serviços.

2.  **Agência Virtual e App**: Acesse o portal da Light ou utilize o aplicativo *Light Clientes* para solicitar a "análise de conta".

3.  **Telefone**: Ligue para o *Disque-Light Comercial* no número **0800 282 0120**.

Para agilizar o atendimento, tenha em mãos o seu *CPF* e o *Código do Cliente*, que você encontra em destaque na sua conta de luz.

Se o seu problema não for resolvido por esses canais, você pode registrar uma reclamação na *Ouvidoria* da Light pelo telefone **0800 284 0182**.
