task_data.prompt: to dentro do frescão e o ar condicionado ta desligado, um calor do inferno aqui dentro. o motorista nao quer ligar. pra quem eu reclamo?
task_data.golden_answer:
Para reclamar sobre ar-condicionado desligado em ônibus, registre a *Verificação de ar condicionado inoperante no ônibus* pelos canais da Central 1746 (SMTR):
 
 * Site: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10870066623003-Verifica%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-ar-condicionado-inoperante-no-%C3%B4nibus
 * WhatsApp/app 1746 Rio: escolha *Verificação de ar condicionado inoperante no ônibus*
 * Telefone: *1746* ou (21) 3460-1746
 
 Informe: data, hora e número da linha (obrigatório); número do carro, se possível.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Você pode e deve reclamar sobre o ar-condicionado desligado. A Prefeitura do Rio tem um canal específico para isso.

A denúncia é feita pela *Central 1746*. O canal mais direto é o *WhatsApp da Central*, no número *(21) 3460-1746*.

Para registrar a reclamação, *anote e informe*:
- O *número da linha* do ônibus.
- O *número de ordem do veículo* (geralmente fica visível na parte da frente do salão).
- A *data e a hora* do ocorrido.

Com esses dados, a equipe de fiscalização pode identificar e multar a empresa responsável. Você também pode ligar para o *1746* ou usar o portal *1746.rio*.

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** 2025-08-08

**Research Topic:** Reclamar ar condicionado ônibus Rio de Janeiro

**Summary:**

To file a complaint regarding the air conditioning in Rio de Janeiro's buses, passengers can utilize the Central 1746 service, which is managed by the Municipal Secretariat of Transport (SMTR). [1] This service is accessible through various channels, including telephone, WhatsApp (21 3460-1746), the 1746 Rio application, and the official website. [1]

When making a complaint, it is essential to provide specific details such as the date, time, and the bus line number. [1] Additional information like the bus car number can also be included. [2] With this information, SMTR inspectors can investigate the reported lines and issue fines to the consortia if irregularities are found. [1] Complainants can track the progress of their reports using the provided registration number. [1]

The SMTR has been actively addressing issues with bus air conditioning. Since November of the previous year, consortia are mandated to operate buses with functioning air conditioning in vehicles equipped with climate control, which constitutes 70% of the fleet. [1] In 2023 alone, approximately 7.8 thousand fines were issued to bus consortia for issues related to air conditioning or its poor maintenance, though only a fraction of these fines were paid. [3] The SMTR also reported applying over 200 fines for lack of refrigeration prior to the launch of the dedicated complaint service. [1]

In addition to the Central 1746, the State Secretariat for Consumer Defense (SEDCON) and PROCON-RJ have also been conducting fiscalizations to address air conditioning issues in buses. These actions are prompted by numerous complaints received through their respective channels. [4] During a recent operation, 50 buses were inspected, and 10 were found to be without functioning air conditioning, leading to notifications for the involved companies to provide explanations within 15 days, under penalty of substantial fines. [4]

The Portal Rio 1746 also offers a specific service for the verification of inoperable or malfunctioning air conditioning on buses, requiring similar details for the complaint. [2] The response time for these requests is typically within 10 business days. [2]

It is important to note that while the number of buses with non-functioning air conditioning has reportedly decreased, some companies cite financial difficulties, including recovery processes and issues with vehicle acquisition and maintenance, as reasons for ongoing problems. [2] The city of Rio de Janeiro has also indicated that it may cut subsidies to bus companies with frequent air conditioning failures. [3]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/transportes/secretaria-de-transportes-lanca-servico-exclusivo-para-denuncias-sobre-ar-condicionado-desligado-em-onibus/)

tool_return.text:
### Research Artifact: Problems with the Jaé Card on Rio de Janeiro Buses

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

The implementation of the new "Jaé" card for public transportation in Rio de Janeiro has been met with various problems and user complaints, particularly concerning its use on buses. These issues range from difficulties with the accompanying application and card delivery to operational failures in the validation and integration systems.

**Key Problems Identified:**

*   **Application and Digital Access Issues:** Users have reported significant difficulties accessing the Jaé application, with some stating it became unusable after the card became mandatory for municipal buses. Complaints include inability to log in, perform any functions, and issues with receiving verification codes.
* [1]   **Card Delivery and Availability:** Problems with the physical delivery of the Jaé card have been noted, with some users who paid for home delivery not receiving their cards. Others have reported their cards still being in production months after ordering.
*  [2]  **Validation and Integration Failures:** The initial days of the Jaé card's mandatory use saw widespread reports of validation failures on buses and other municipal transport modes like the BRT and VLT. Some [2] passengers experienced situations where the card worked on one bus but not another, even with a valid balance. There [1] were also issues with the integration of the Jaé card with previous systems, such as the Riocard, and with the QR Code system generated by the app.
*    [2]**Recharge and Balance Issues:** Passengers have encountered problems with recharging their Jaé cards, with some recharges made via the previous Riocard system not migrating to the new card. There [2] are also reports of machines retaining cards or malfunctioning, leading to financial loss for users.
*   * [3]*Gratuity Access Problems:** Beneficiaries of free travel, such as the elderly, people with disabilities, and chronic patients, have faced difficulties using their Jaé cards, with some not being recognized by validators, particularly in integration points like the metro.
*   **Customer [4] Support and Information Deficiencies:** Users have complained about unprepared municipal teams providing guidance, insufficient information at terminals, and long queues at service points, with some locations having only one attendant or defective recharge machines. Some users [2] reported being unable to get basic questions answered at service posts or over the phone.
*   **Impact [5] on Transport Workers:** Bus drivers and inspectors have also faced challenges, including dealing with passenger complaints, the need to handle cash payments again due to card issues, and uncertainty regarding their own free travel benefits with the new system.
*   **Integration [2] with Other Transport Modes:** While the Jaé card is for municipal transport, issues have arisen regarding integration with state-managed services. For instance, the Riocard remains necessary for certain benefits like the R$ 5 fare on the metro and for integration with trains, subways, and intercity buses.

**Official [4] Response and Context:**

The Mayor of Rio de Janeiro, Eduardo Paes, acknowledged that some problems were natural given the complexity of the system transformation, which aims to give the municipality more control over the public transport ticketing system. In response [4] to the initial chaos, the city authorized free boarding in exceptional cases on the first day of mandatory use, particularly at metro integration points, for passengers facing insurmountable difficulties. The city [4] also stated that efforts were being made to expand support channels and resolve reported issues.

**Reimbursement [2] of Riocard Balance:**

Users with remaining balances on their Riocard cards need to request a refund, as the balance is not automatically transferred to the Jaé card. This process typically involves visiting Riocard stores or using their online services, with a processing time of 10 to 15 business days.

**Current [3] Status:**

As of the second day of mandatory use, passengers continued to face problems with recharges, application access, and card delivery, leading to long queues and frustration. The city [1] has committed to ongoing dialogue with operators and the public to ensure a smoother transition.
The search [2] results indicate that the Jaé card is intended for municipal transport, including buses, BRT, VLT, and legal vans. Integration with the metro and SuperVia (trains) is also mentioned, but the Riocard remains essential for intercity transport and specific benefits like the Bilhete Único Intermunicipal (BUI) and the R$ 5 metro fare. This necessitates [4] that some passengers maintain both the Jaé and Riocard cards. [2]

task_data.prompt: perdi meu riocard, tinha credito nele. como eu faço pra bloquear e pegar outro com o saldo que tinha?
task_data.golden_answer:
* Acesse https://www.riocardmais.com.br/Para_voce, faça login em "Cartões" e selecione "Cancelar cartão" – prazo de até 48 h. *Importante:* o cartão precisa estar cadastrado no CPF para recuperar o crédito
 * No WhatsApp, chame o Tomais: (21) 2127-4000 e solicite o bloqueio imediato
 * Em uma Loja Riocard (https://ondeestamos.riocardmais.com.br), apresente CPF e documento e peça a 2ª via. Se for Vale-Transporte vinculado ao CPF, o saldo será transferido para o novo cartão

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Sim, é possível bloquear seu Riocard perdido e solicitar a transferência do saldo para um novo cartão. Siga estes passos:

1.  ***Bloqueie o cartão imediatamente***. A forma mais rápida é pela *Central de Atendimento Riocard Mais* no WhatsApp: **(21) 2127-4000**. Você também pode fazer pelo site *atende.riocardmais.com.br*.

2.  ***Solicite a transferência do saldo***. Após o bloqueio, o valor que estava no cartão antigo poderá ser transferido para uma nova via.

*Atenção:* Para recuperar os créditos, é *fundamental que o cartão esteja associado ao seu CPF*. Sem esse cadastro, não é possível reaver o saldo.

O crédito será transferido para o novo cartão em até 48 horas após o cancelamento do antigo.

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** Friday, August 8, 2025 at 9:57 PM UTC

**Research Topic:** Bloquear Riocard e transferir saldo

**Summary of Findings:**

To block a Riocard and transfer its balance, users have several options, primarily through Riocard Mais's official channels. The process generally involves canceling the existing card and then initiating a transfer of the remaining balance to a new card or a designated account.

**Blocking a Riocard:**
In case of loss or theft, it is crucial to immediately request the cancellation of the Riocard. This can be done by contacting Riocard Mais through their customer service channels, which include a WhatsApp number (21) 2127-4000, their website (atende.riocardmais.com.br), or their social media platforms [1]. The physical cancellation of the card typically takes up to 48 hours [1]. If a Riocard card remains unused for over 120 days, it will be automatically blocked for security reasons [2].

**Transferring Riocard Balance:**
The transfer of a Riocard balance is possible, particularly when moving from a canceled card to a new one. This process is often referred to as transferring a "bolsa de crédito" (credit balance). [3] To initiate this transfer, users typically need to access the Riocard Mais website (cartaoriocard.com.br/paraVoce). [3] Within the website, users should navigate to the "Pedidos" (Orders) section and select the option for "Transferência do saldo do cartão cancelado para segunda via" (Transfer of balance from canceled card to a second copy). After [1] confirming the user and the transfer, the credits are usually released to the new card within 48 hours. It [2] is important to ensure that the card to be canceled is registered to the user's CPF for the transfer to be successful.

 [1]**Important Considerations:**
*   **Card Registration:** For credit recovery and balance transfers, it is essential that the Riocard card is registered to the user's CPF.
* [1]   **Riocard to Jaé Transition:** With the recent transition to the Jaé card system for municipal transport in Rio de Janeiro, Riocard balances cannot be directly transferred to the Jaé system. Instead, users who are discontinuing their Riocard usage must request a refund of the available balance. This [4] refund can be requested online via a video call on the teleatendimentolojas.riocardmais.com.br/cliente website or in person at Riocard Mais stores. The refund [4] is typically deposited into a bank account linked to the user's CPF within 10 to 15 business days.
*    [5]**Card Blocking Does Not Affect Balance:** Blocking a Riocard card does not affect its balance, unless the card's validity period expires.

**Contact [2] Information:**
*   **Riocard Mais Customer Service:** (21) 2127-4000
*   **Website for Transfers and Cancellations:** www.cartaoriocard.com.br/rcc/paraVoce or atende.riocardmais.com.br
*   **Refunds/Video Calls:** teleatendimentolojas.riocardmais.com.br/cliente

**Sources:**
 - [1] [riocardmais.com.br](https://www.riocardmais.com.br/duvidas-frequentes/o-que-acontece-em-caso-de-perda-ou-roubo-do-cartao-riocard-mais-expresso-881.html)

task_data.prompt: o onibus 606 fez um caminho diferente hoje. a rota mudou ou foi só por causa do transito? onde eu vejo isso?
task_data.golden_answer:
O itinerário oficial da linha *606* é *Terminal Intermodal Gentileza ↔ Engenho de Dentro*, implantado em março de 2024 pela Prefeitura do Rio. Se hoje o ônibus fez trajeto diferente, trata-se de desvio pontual por trânsito, obras ou evento, e não de mudança definitiva.
 
 Para verificar alterações permanentes, acesse o serviço de *Verificação de alteração de itinerário de ônibus* no Portal 1746:
 https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10870200688539-Verificação-de-alteração-de-itinerário-de-ônibus

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Mudanças no trajeto dos ônibus podem acontecer por causa do trânsito, de obras ou eventos na cidade.

Para verificar em tempo real o trajeto da sua linha e saber sobre alterações, você pode usar os aplicativos oficiais ou parceiros da Prefeitura, como o *Jaé* ou *Cittamobi*. Eles mostram a localização dos ônibus no mapa. 🚌

Se você acredita que a mudança é irregular ou permanente, pode registrar uma reclamação na *Central 1746*, seja pelo telefone ou pelo site https://1746.rio.

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 8, 2025

**Research Topic:** Where to check for bus route changes in Rio de Janeiro.

To find information about bus route changes in Rio de Janeiro, several official channels and applications are available. The primary sources for reporting and checking bus route alterations, especially those due to operational issues or driver non-compliance with the designated route, are the Portal Carioca Digital and the Portal Rio 1746 [1].

The Portal Carioca Digital offers a service for "Verificação de alteração de itinerário de ônibus" (Verification of bus route changes). This service allows citizens to report instances where a bus driver deviates from the established route. To utilize this service, users can access it through the Portal Carioca Digital, fill out a form with details such as the bus company, line number, frequency of the issue, and the specific street where the deviation occurred. Responses to these requests are typically sent via email.

The [1] Portal Rio 1746 also provides a similar service for "Verificação de alteração de itinerário de ônibus". Through this [1] portal, users can report issues related to bus routes. The information required for opening a report includes the bus company name (Intersul, Internorte, Transcarioca, or Santa Cruz), the line number, how often the problem occurs, and the street where the bus did not follow its route or went where it shouldn't have. The expected response time for these reports is up to 10 days. The 1746 service [2] can be accessed via phone (1746 within Rio de Janeiro, or (21) 3460-1746 from other locations) or through the 1746 Rio application. The 1746 service [1] has been operational for over a decade, offering a wide range of municipal services, and has expanded its reach through a mobile unit ("1746 na pista") to connect with citizens across all neighborhoods.

For real-time [3] information and route planning, the "Vá de Ônibus" application is recommended. This app provides passengers with all the itineraries of bus lines operating in the city, using georeferencing technology to identify the best travel options. It also allows users to see the exact location of circulating vehicles on their routes. Another application [4] mentioned is Cittamobi, which offers real-time bus tracking, route planning, and additional features like card recharges and digital ticket purchases. The city of Rio [4] de Janeiro has also partnered with the Quicko app, which provides information on bus operations, system changes, and user alerts, allowing users to report service issues.

The Secretaria [1] Municipal de Transportes (SMTR) is the municipal body responsible for public transport in Rio de Janeiro and oversees various aspects of bus operations, including the regulation of bus lines and the monitoring of the transport system. Information regarding [4] specific route diversions, such as those caused by events or road works, is also communicated by the Prefeitura do Rio. For instance [1], a specific announcement detailed diversions for 27 bus lines in the Centro area due to an event, with the main diversion route passing through Lapa, Praça da Cruz Vermelha, Praça da República, and Avenida Presidente Vargas.

In summary, for [1] reporting deviations or seeking information on bus route changes, the Portal Carioca Digital and Portal Rio 1746 are the official channels. For real-time tracking and route planning, applications like "Vá de Ônibus" and Cittamobi are available.

**Sources:**
 - [1] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/verificacao-de-alteracao-de-itinerario-de-onibus/)
 - [2] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10870200688539-Verifica%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-altera%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-itiner%C3%A1rio-de-%C3%B4nibus)
 - [3] [rioonibus.com](https://rioonibus.com/apps-servicos/)
 - [4] [prefeitura.rio](https://transportes.prefeitura.rio/)
